original: Government Reform Progress is less than $PROGRESS|Y$.\n
Government Reform Progress is at least $PROGRESS|Y$.\n
translation: 政府改革进度至少达到 $PROGRESS|Y$。\n

original: A Scornful Insult will double the loss of opinion but also make their enemies like us more. It costs §Y5§! Prestige.
translation: 轻蔑的侮辱会加倍降低好感度，但也会使他们的敌人更喜欢我们。这需要花费§Y5§!威望。

original: Go back to a previous insult
§YLeft Click to view all available policies.§!
translation: §Y左键点击查看所有可用政策。§!

original: We have access to this Policy because we have completed $IDEA1|Y$ and $IDEA2|Y$.
translation: 我们已经完成了$IDEA1|Y$和$IDEA2|Y$，所以可以使用此政策。

original: While originally a term applied to all Marathi-speaking peoples, the Marathas have defined themselves as a caste of warriors. The Marathas are found both in their native home of Maharashtra and beyond, seeking opportunities for distinguished military service.
translation: 虽然马拉塔最初是指所有说马拉地语的印度人，不过现在马拉塔这个种姓已经成为一群战士的特称。现在不仅仅是那些生活在马哈拉施特拉邦的人被称为马拉塔人，军中那些奋力博取功名的战士也被称为马拉塔人。

original: Jainism is no longer a dominant or politically favored faith in India, but the Jains are far from irrelevant. They have found a niche in moneylending and bureaucracy that makes them an asset to any state that offers them patronage.
translation: 虽然耆那教早已不再是官方的或事实上的印度主流宗教，但耆那教的信徒们依旧不可小觑。他们通过放贷与做官，在各个邦都拥有不小的政治能量。

original: In Vedic scripture, the Vaishya caste are laborers and agriculturalists of relatively low status. They have since branched out into more lucrative professions; merchants, craftsmen, men of money, they are the lifeblood of Indian commerce.
translation: 在吠陀经中，吠舍种姓是地位相对较低的力工或农夫。他们已经开始跻身更有利可图的行业；外贸商、工匠和财主：他们可是印度商业的命脉。

original: The Rajputs are an ancient caste of honorable warriors and proud nobles. While the rugged land of Rajasthan is the heart of their power, Rajput nobility can be found throughout northern India and many great Rajas claim Rajput descent.
translation: 拉杰普特种姓源自古老的贵族和勇士。虽然崎岖的拉贾斯坦邦是他们权力的中心，但他们的影响力已经覆盖了整个北印度。有很多伟大的君主就宣称自己有拉杰普特血统。

original: The Brahmins are the priestly caste of Hinduism. They are the keepers of ceremonies and scriptures, as few non-Brahmins are educated in Sanskrit literature. They command great respect from Hindus and non-Hindus alike, and sometimes take roles in government.
translation: 婆罗门是印度教的祭司阶层。他们是仪式和经文的守护者，因为很少有非婆罗门人接受过梵文文学的教育。他们受到印度教徒与非印度教徒的极大尊重，也会在政府中扮演一定的角色。

original: At least one owned province belongs to the §YRajputs§! Estate.
translation: 至少有一个省份属于§Y拉杰普特§!阶层。

original: Up to §Y10§! §YRajput Regiments§! will be recruited dependent on the number of provinces under §YRajputs§! control and current §YRajputs§! influence.\nNumber of §YRajput Regiments§! cannot exceed the number of provinces controlled by the §YRajput§! estate.
translation: 根据§Y拉杰普特§!控制下的省份数目和影响力，§Y10§!支§Y拉杰普特军团§!会被招募。\n§Y拉杰普特军团§!的数目不能超出§Y拉杰普特§!阶层控制的省份数目。
被提拔的拉杰普特贵族: §Y$VAL$%§!

original: Every province controlled by the §YMaratha§! will gain §R15%§! Local Autonomy and §G25%§! local manpower.
translation: 每个被§Y马拉塔§!阶层控制的省份会获得§R15%§!的地方自治度和§G25%§!的当地人力。

original: Every province controlled by the §YRajputs§! will gain §R15%§! Local Autonomy.
translation: 每一个被§Y拉杰普特§!阶层控制的省份将会获得 §R15%§!自治度.

original: We are putting out word that we are recruiting skilled Rajput warriors. These elite warriors will be attracted to our banner.
translation: 我们正宣传招募娴熟的拉杰普特战士，这些精锐战士将会被吸引至我们麾下。
不干涉马拉塔贵族事务
委任耆那教徒创作经典

original: Every province controlled by the §YJains§! will gain §R15%§! Local Autonomy.
translation: 每一个被§Y耆那教徒§!控制的省份将会获得 §R15%§! 自治度.

original: Our patronage of Jain temples in this province encourages the local Jain community to assist us in our efforts to develop the province.
translation: 我们在这个省对耆那教寺庙的赞助鼓励了当地耆那教社区帮助我们发展这个省。

original: At least one owned province belongs to the §YJains§! Estate.
translation: 拥有的省份中至少有一个属于§Y耆那教徒§!阶层。

original: A random province controlled by the §YJains§! will gain §G-10%§! Local Development Cost for §Y10§! years\nGain §G1§! Base Tax in a province controlled by the Jains.
translation: 一个被§Y耆那教§!控制的随机省份会在§Y10§!年内获得§G+1§!税收\n在一个耆那教控制的省份获得§G1§!基础税收。

original: A random province controlled by the §YJains§! will gain §G+1§! Tax Income for §Y10§! years\nGain §G1§! Base Tax in a province controlled by the Jains.
translation: 一个被§Y耆那教§!控制的随机省份会在§Y10§!年内获得§G+1§!税收\n在一个耆那教控制的省份获得§G1§!基础税收。
来自婆罗门给予的合法性

original: Our Hindu subjects see our rule as more legitimate now that we have the approval of the Brahmin caste.
translation: 我们的印度人臣民更加认可我们的统治了，因为我们现在得到了婆罗门种姓的认可。

original: You can enact Policies in the following categories for free:\n$LIST$
translation: 你可以在以下类别中制定免费政策：\n$LIST$

original: The fall of the City of Victory - Vijayanagar - at the end of a decisive confrontation with the [Root.GetAdjective], sultans have sent a shockwave through the Deccan.\nPlundering the city is said to have taken several days and while it remains one of the larger settlements in the region it seems unlikely that it will ever again be the metropolis it once was.
translation: 毗奢耶那伽罗的激烈对峙以[Root.GetAdjective]苏丹胜利告终，这座胜利之城的陷落在德干地区引发了震荡。\n据说，这座城市被掠夺了数天。它仍是该地区较大的定居点，但似乎不再会是以前的大都市。

original: To the victor goes the spoils.

The fall of the City of Victory - Vijayanagar - at the end of a decisive confrontation in which the [Root.GetAdjective] sultans prevailed, have sent a shockwave through the Deccan.
Plundering the city is said to have taken several days and while it remains one of the larger settlements in the region it seems unlikely that it will ever again be the metropolis it once was.
While the Vijayanagari state still remains in power over parts of its old domain, many of its subordinate captains and vassals are now looking elsewhere for protection, for a more worthy cause to serve.
This seems to be the end of the empire the Sangamas once founded.
translation:
毗奢耶那伽罗的激烈对峙以[Root.GetAdjective]苏丹胜利告终，这座胜利之城的陷落在德干地区引发了震荡。
据说，这座城市被掠夺了数天。它仍是该地区较大的定居点，但似乎不再会是以前的大都市。
虽然毗奢耶那伽罗国仍然掌控着部分旧领地，但许多下属首领们和附庸们正在寻求其他保护，一个更加值得服务的对象。
这似乎将是桑伽马曾经建立的帝国的终结。

original: By losing our ancestral capital, the City of Victory itself, we have proven to all our subjects that we are not fit to rule these lands. Trust could perhaps be rebuilt in time but for now a grave sense of insubordination has begun to spread within our realm.
translation: 由于失去我们祖祖辈辈的首都，胜利之城，我们已经向所有臣民显示，我们不适合统治这些土地。信任也许可以及时重建，但现在，一种严重的叛逆感已经开始在我们的领土内传播。

original: While Delhi is in many ways the undisputed capital of northern India it has also known many conquerors. The Bahmani Sultans, once the subjects of an empire based in this very city, has now added themselves to the list of conquerors. As the city burns, Bahmani soldiers collect their spoils. Treasuries are emptied and monuments torn down, to be transported and re-enacted in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName].
translation: 虽然德里在许多方面都是北印度无可争议的首都，但也有许多征服者将其征服。巴赫曼尼苏丹，曾经身为奠基于这座城市的帝国的臣民，现在已经加入了征服者的名单。随着城市的燃烧，巴赫曼尼士兵收集着他们的战利品。财富被洗劫一空，纪念碑被拆毁并将被运送到[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]重组。

original: Delhi is the city that the Muslim sultanates have made their capital in India but it was once a city ruled by Rajputs. As the armies of Mewar descended upon the ancient city, it seems they must have found it the most important to mark the end of Sultanate rule however.\nWhile the looting is not comparable to when the city fell to Timur's armies monuments have been torn down and treasures looted. The fall of Delhi marks a major shift in Indian politics, only time will tell what will happen next.
translation: 德里是穆斯林苏丹国在印度的首都，但曾经却是拉杰普特人统治的城市。 等到梅瓦尔的军队征服了这座古城，他们似乎却认为最重要的是表明苏丹国统治的结束。\n虽然抢劫与城市落入帖木儿军队时纪念碑的拆除和财产抢劫无法比拟。德里的沦陷标志着印度政治中的重要转变，只有时间能知道接下来会发生什么。

original: In response to the reduction of property of the Brahmins, the faithful Hindus of the province have risen up to protect the Brahmins from our soldiers.
translation: 作为对削夺婆罗门财产的回应，该省忠诚的印度教徒已经起义，保护婆罗门，对抗我们的军队。
婆罗门要求朝廷职位正当化

original: Brahmins often aspire to worldly power as well as mere spiritual authority. They have become highly influential of late in [Root.Country.GetName], and many important positions in the administration are now held by Brahmins. Having become comfortable in their grand appointments, these Brahmins have approached the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] with a series of demands. They require that certain administrative posts be entrusted to the Brahmins by law, that Brahmin customs become mandatory at court, and even that several of the highest ministerial offices be held by Brahmin families in heredity. Outrageous as these demands are, the influence of the Brahmins is such that refusing could seriously hinder our ability to govern.
translation: 婆罗门们渴求世俗权力及纯粹的精神权威。他们近来已经在[Root.Country.GetName]变得极具影响力，许多行政要职已被他们控制。久居高位之后，他们开始向[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]提出各种要求。他们要求依法将一些行政职位委托给婆罗门，朝廷强制按婆罗门习惯执行，甚至一些最高行政机构也应由婆罗门家族把持。鉴于他们强大的影响力，拒绝这些蛮横无理的请求很可能会使我们的统治受损。

original: Reject their demands and curtail their temporal power.
translation: 拒绝他们的要求并剥夺其世俗权力。
婆罗门在朝廷上的地位根深蒂固: §Y$VAL$%§!

original: The Brahmins should return to their prayers.
translation: 婆罗门教徒应当回到他们的祷告中去。

original: Public sentiment among the Hindus of [Root.Country.GetName] has shifted toward Brahminism, the view that the Brahmin caste must be respected and revered as both spiritual and temporal authorities. The Brahmins jealously guard their monopoly on Sanskrit education, keeping as their exclusive domain the ability to preach the Vedas. Their social and religious authority makes them powerful, and [Root.Monarch.GetName]’s excellent relations with the priestly caste help to keep a stable social order throughout [Root.Country.GetName].
translation: [Root.Country.GetName]的印度教徒的舆论已经转向婆罗门主义，该教认为婆罗门种姓必须被恭敬地对待而且尊为精神和世俗的权威。婆罗门精心捍卫他们对梵语教育的垄断，以保持为他们的专属领域来传播吠陀经。他们的社会和宗教权威使他们变得强大。君主[Root.Monarch.GetName]和该祭司阶层的友好关系有助于在整个[Root.Country.GetName]维持稳定的社会秩序。

original: The Brahmins of [Root.Country.GetName] are a rising power. They have rallied the popular support of the Hindu population through their position as the divinely-ordained priestly caste, and occupy several key positions within the [Root.GetAdjective] administration.
translation: [Root.Country.GetName]的婆罗门是一支正在崛起的力量。他们作为神任命的祭司阶层，获得了印度民众的广泛支持, 并且占据了许多重要的位置，包括[Root.GetAdjective]管理。

original: More than any other caste the influence of the Brahmins is dependent on their standing with the Hindu faithful. It has been hard to determine a precise cause but they have come to be seen less as the custodians of Vedic doctrine and more as rich and corrupted intrigue-makers. Combined with poor political maneuvering and lack of favor in the eyes of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] the Brahmins have been losing both power and influence.
translation: 与其他任何一个阶层相比，婆罗门的影响力依赖于他们在印度教信徒中的地位。而近年来婆罗门本身越发难插手到国家事务中，因为他们已经变得越发腐朽且虚伪弄权，而再非吠陀经教义的监护人。再加上失败的政治手段且失去了[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的青眼，婆罗门已然把权力与影响力败光了。

original: The state’s relations with the Brahmin caste have reached breaking point. Pujaris openly condemn [Root.Monarch.GetName] during ceremonies and Brahmin families refuse to cooperate in the rule of our Hindu subjects. A recent religious faux-pas on the part of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has tipped mere outrage into outright rebellion. The Brahmins have incited the people to rise against our rule!
translation: 该州与婆罗门种姓间的矛盾已达到顶点。 祭司在仪式期间公开谴责[Root.Monarch.GetName]，婆罗门信徒拒绝与我们的印度统治者合作。最近发生在[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的宗教失礼事件只不过是对这种矛盾彻底愤怒的导火索。这些婆罗门开始煽动民众反对我们的统治！

original: The city of [brahmin_trade_province.GetCapitalName] is an important regional trade hub for [Root.Country.GetName]. It is visited often by Muslim traders from Gujarat, Arabia, and Persia, and [brahmin_trade_province.GetName] has profited from strong commercial connections with these merchants.\n\n[brahmin_trade_province.GetName] has come to be administered by a group of Brahmin clerics whose influence has been felt at every level of society. They have enacted a series of policies and created a social atmosphere that is far from friendly from the perspective of visiting Muslim traders. As a result, many of these alienated traders have decided to take their business elsewhere. [brahmin_trade_province.GetName] at risk of losing its status as a trade hub if something is not done to attract commerce back to the city.
translation: [brahmin_trade_province.GetCapitalName]是[Root.Country.GetName]区域里的重要贸易中心。来自古吉拉特、阿拉伯和波斯的穆斯林商人经常到此进行商品交易，凭借这些络绎不绝的商贸往来[brahmin_trade_province.GetName]也从中获益得以繁荣。\n\n目前[brahmin_trade_province.GetName]由一群婆罗门神职人员管理著，他们的影响力在社会的各个层面中都有所体现。他们制定了一系列政策，而从穆斯林商人的角度来看这些政策绝非友善。这种疏远交易者的决策后果就是导致许多商人将业务转移到其他地方。如果不采取措施将商人吸引回来，[brahmin_trade_province.GetName]有可能失去其作为贸易中心的地位。

original: The troubles of low-caste merchants are not our concern.
translation: 那些低种姓商人团的麻烦与我们无关。

original: Hand the city to leaders more concerned with trade relations.
translation: 将城市交给更加关注贸易关系的领袖

original: One Brahmin has proven a highly capable administrator and has gained the ear of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. While Brahmins have long been entrenched into [Root.Country.GetName]’s bureaucracy, it is rare for Brahmins to have an explicitly political role even in the courts of Hindu nations.\nThe appointment of this Brahmin as Peshwa, the highest appointed ministerial office, is an appealing prospect. Though Brahmins throughout [Root.Country.GetName] would take the opportunity to increase their influence, it would assure our Hindu subjects that we have their best interests at heart.
translation: 一名婆罗门是杰出的管理人才，他也获得了[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的认可。虽然婆罗门已经长期把持了[Root.Country.GetName]的官僚机构，但是在朝堂上却罕有他们的身影。\n任命这位婆罗门为佩什瓦（即宰相）是一个吸引人的前景。尽管整个[Root.Country.GetName]的婆罗门会借机扩大他们的影响力，这也不失为向印度教徒承诺我们重视他们的利益的机会。

original: Appoint a promising trader of Vaishya caste.
translation: 任命一个有前途的吠舍种姓交易商

original: The Brahmins have traditionally had a monopoly on Hindu religious authority, but occasionally religious movements emerge that challenge Brahminism. Such movements are becoming popular throughout [Root.Country.GetName] in spite of Brahmin efforts to suppress them. Exponents of popular religion argue that the Brahmins have wiped off the sacred marks from their foreheads and eschewed their spiritual responsibilities in order to occupy seats of temporal power and mete out injustice to the poor. They declare that selfless devotion is the only path to salvation, a virtue that can be attained by any sufficiently fervent Hindu.\n\nA group of influential Brahmins have approached the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] pleading for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] aid in restoring public confidence in Brahmin authority and suppressing non-Brahmin Hindu movements.
translation: 传统上婆罗门垄断了印度教的宗教权威，但偶尔会出现挑战婆罗门主义的宗教运动。 尽管婆罗门努力镇压它们，但这些运动在[Root.Country.GetName]变得越来越流行。 运动的支持者认为，婆罗门人已经抹去了他们的额头上的神圣痕迹，逃避了他们精神的责任，以便掌握世俗的权利，并不公正地对待穷人。 他们宣称，无私奉献是通向救赎的唯一途径，任何足够热情的印度教徒都可以获得这种美德。\n\n一群有影响力的婆罗门已经来到[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]身边，请求[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]帮助以恢复婆罗门在公众中的权威并镇压非婆罗门的宗教运动。
允许婆罗门强制推行正教。
鼓励受欢迎的宗教行动

original: Every owned province with the §YBrahmins§! estate gets §Y'Brahmin Orthodoxy Enforced'§! for §Y15 years§!, giving the following effects:\nLocal Unrest: §R+5.00§!\nMonthly Autonomy Change: §G-0.05%§!
translation: 名下所有拥有§Y婆罗门§!阶层的省份将得到为期§Y15年§!的§Y「婆罗门正统性加强」§!，给予以下效果：\n本地叛乱风险：§R+5.00§!\n每月自治度变化：§G-0.05％§!

original: The court of [Root.Country.GetName] has become embroiled in a conflict between the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and the military castes. In the wake of these rising tensions, the matter of fort stewardship has risen to our attention. The fort of [brahmin_fort_province.GetName], currently held by a particularly contentious general, lies in a province where the Brahmins are gaining influence of their own.\n\nForeseeing the potential for tensions to break out into hostilities, it may be wise to transfer control of this important fort from the contentious general to the Brahmins. Though less adept than military men at siegecraft, the Brahmins are at least loyal to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. Alternatively, the general could be persuaded to change his attitude in exchange for the retention of his privileges in [brahmin_fort_province.GetName].
translation: [Root.Country.GetName]法院卷入了[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]与军队种姓间的冲突。随着局势的升级，堡垒管理归属开始引起了人们的注意。[brahmin_fort_province.GetName]的堡垒目前由一个极具争议性的将军控制，然而该省的婆罗门影响力也在逐渐提升。\n鉴于局势紧张带来的潜在的敌对冲突，将堡垒的控制权移交给婆罗门似乎较为明智。尽管对攻城器械操纵的不如军人们娴熟，但至少婆罗门们对[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]十分忠诚。或者，可以说服将军改变他的态度，以换取他在[brahmin_fort_province.GetName]特权的维持。

original: Hand over the fort to the Brahmins.
Let the nobles keep the fort, so long as they remain loyal.
translation: 让贵族保留这座堡垒，只要他们保持忠诚。

original: The Status of the Brahmins in [Root.Country.GetName]

As a Muslim nation, the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ expects that our government be in accordance with [Root.Religion.GetName] doctrine. Heathens should be stripped of their social influence, should pay the jizya tax, and most certainly should not be allowed to occupy positions of power in the administration.

It has been difficult to comply with their demands for strict piety however given that so many of our subjects follow the Hindu faith and venerate the priestly Brahmin caste. Even among Muslim nations in India the Brahmins commonly hold positions in the state bureaucracy and aid the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] with local rulership. To many at court, to discount the advantages of Brahmin loyalty would be a great folly.

[Root.Country.GetName] must consider wisely the path it wishes to tread with regards to its treatment of the Brahmins, and indeed of the Hindu population as a whole.
translation:
作为一个穆斯林国家，$ESTATE_CHURCH$希望政府遵循[Root.Religion.GetName]教义—— 异教徒应该被剥夺社会影响力，支付人头税，而且不应该在政府中占据权力。

鉴于我们的许多臣民都信仰印度教并敬仰担任祭司的婆罗门，因此很难满足他们的严格要求。 甚至，在印度的地方穆斯林政府中，婆罗门通常在官僚机构中担任职务，并帮助[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]在当地统治。 对于在朝廷上的许多人来说，放弃婆罗门的贡献是非常愚蠢的行为。

[Root.Country.GetName]必须通盘考虑在婆罗门以及整个印度教人群中的影响后决定今后的政策。

original: Allow the Brahmins to serve as bureaucrats.
Keep the Brahmins out of government.
Break the power of the Brahmins in society.

translation: 隔绝婆罗门与官僚系统: §Y$VAL$§!

original: Appalled at the loss of their privileges the Vaishyas of the [Root.GetName] province have taken up arms against us!
translation: 因惊恐于权益的损失，[Root.GetName]省份的吠舍拿起武器反抗我们！

original:
A host of social and economic problems in [Root.Country.GetName] have led to an eruption of highway banditry throughout the realm. Banditry has become so prolific that some cities have not received a single trade caravan in months.

Several bandit leaders are seen as folk heroes by the local populace, bravely resisting the rule of the parasitic state of [Root.Country.GetName], founding new frontier towns, and recruiting local labor. Drawing into their ranks Hindus and Muslims, toddy-tappers and smiths, the bandits have attracted widespread support.

A direct military confrontation with the bandits would solve the immediate problem if we could root them out from their makeshift forts. However, the problem is only likely to resurface if we do not address the social and economic factors that make the bandits powerful and popular.
translation:
[Root.Country.GetName]的一系列社会和经济问题导致贼寇四起。匪患如此之盛，以至于一些城市几个月都没有贸易大篷车到来。

一些贼寇首领被当地民众视为抵抗[Root.Country.GetName]的吸血统治的绿林好汉，他们兴建新的边境城镇，并招募当地劳工。贼寇们得到了广泛的支持，印度教徒和穆斯林、酿酒师和铁匠都加入到他们的行列中。

军事平定临时堡垒中的贼寇可以解决当务之急。然而根本在于使贼寇强大和受欢迎的社会和经济因素，不解决的话，问题只会重新出现。

original: Address the social causes of banditry.
translation: 解决引发匪患的社会问题。

original: The Vaishya caste occupies a privileged and favored position in [Root.Country.GetName]. As the backbone of our economy, the Vaishyas expertise in all matters mercantile and industrious are a great boon to our nation. Thanks to our patronage and their rising fortune, the Vaishyas have expanded local industry in [thriving_vaisyas_province.GetName].
translation: 吠舍阶级在[Root.Country.GetName]中享有特权和受青睐的地位。作为我们经济的支柱，吠舍阶级在所有商业和勤劳事务方面的专业知识对我们国家来说是一个巨大的福音。由于我们的赞助和他们不断增长的财富，吠舍在[thriving_vaisyas_province.GetName]扩大了当地的产业。

original: The textile industry of the Indian subcontinent is unrivaled. Vast plantations grow silk and cotton, feeding mighty manufactories that produce countless millions of yards of textile cloth. Planters, weavers, dyers, merchants and even noble princes create an intricate and organized network of labor, production, and trade. Such a thriving commercial market is naturally an ideal breeding ground for innovation. Through our wise delegation of the industry to the Vaishya caste, [Root.Country.GetName] finds itself at the forefront of new developments in textile production.
translation: 印度次大陆的纺织业是无与伦比的。庞大的蚕丝和棉花种植园供应着浩瀚的工坊，生产着无数尺的纺织品。种植者、织布者、染布人、商人，甚至王公贵族共同派生出了一个复杂而有组织的劳动、生产和贸易网络。如此一个繁荣的商业市场自然是创新思潮的发源地。借助我们明智的毗湿派工业代表的力量，[Root.Country.GetName] 以纺织业新发展的前沿而自居。

original: The Vaishyas are of relatively low caste according to Vedic scriptures, but this theoretical rank does not always reflect their true influence. Throughout [Root.Country.GetName] the Vaishyas have seen their fortunes increase, and their status improved in practice if not in theory.
translation: 根据吠陀经，吠舍种姓的地位相对较低，但这种理论上的等级划分并不总能反映他们的真实影响力。在整个[Root.Country.GetName]，吠舍阶层的财富已经变得雄厚了，他们的地位也水涨船高。

original: The Vaishyas, the caste of tradesmen and farmers, have always struggled to exert political and social influence in India’s often rigidly hierarchical society. In recent years their struggle has been in vain, and their influence throughout [Root.Country.GetName] is reduced.
translation: 吠舍，商人和农民的种姓，一直努力在印度僵化的等级社会中发挥政治和社会影响力。近年来他们的斗争都没有取得成效，从而在[Root.Country.GetName]的影响力也不复从前。

original: The Status of the Vaishya Caste

The bounds of caste are felt and seen most explicitly during ritual occasions. With the Brahmins taking center stage for ceremonies, their status as leaders of the spiritual hierarchy is made clear to all in attendance. The Kshatriyas, warriors and princes, make their own displays of power and status.\n\nOften overlooked are the Vaishyas, our traders and craftsmen. Seeking to advance their station, the representatives of the Vaishya guilds have requested that sufficiently esteemed members of their caste be allowed the right to ride palanquins and blow conch shells during certain ceremonies. Granting their request would upset the rigid Brahmins, but would earn the favor of the Vaishyas.
translation: 在宗教仪式的场合，种姓的界限是最明显的。 随着婆罗门在仪式中占据主导地位，他们作为精神层级的领导者的地位已经清楚地向所有出席的人表明。 刹帝利，战士和王公，都在展示他们自己的力量和地位。\n\n经常被忽视的是吠舍阶级，我们的商人和工匠。 为了推进他们的地位，吠舍阶级要求允许其种姓中受到充分尊重的成员在某些仪式上获得乘辇和吹奏海螺的权利。 同意他们的要求会使顽固的婆罗门心烦意乱，但他们会得到吠舍阶级的人情。

original: Promote social advancement for the Vaishyas
The lower castes should know their place.
translation: 这些低种姓应该知道他们的地位

original: [Root.Country.GetName] has become renowned for its trade in high value commodities such as spices, precious gemstones, and fine silks. Merchants come from far off lands to purchase goods that we produce in abundance, but which to them are exotic luxuries.\n\nThe key to our success in these industries has been our patronage of various guilds who draw their membership from the Vaishya caste. Our investments have thus far proven profitable, and it stands to reason that further investment will only continue to yield greater riches. We should determine which of our luxury goods industries is most important to [Root.Country.GetName] and focus our efforts on the advancement of the guilds involved.
translation: [Root.Country.GetName]以高价值商品贸易而闻名，如香料、珍贵的宝石和精美的丝绸。来自遥远土地的商人购买我们大量生产的商品，但对他们来说是异国情调的奢侈品。\n\n赞助成员来自于吠舍种姓的各种行会是我们取得成功的关键。 这些投资带了颇丰的回报，按理说继续投资会产生更多的财富。 我们应该确定哪些奢侈品行业对[Root.Country.GetName]最重要，并将工作重点放在那些涉及的行会上。

original: Spice is the lifeblood of our nation.
translation: 香料是我们国家的命脉。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] has granted many privileges and concessions to the Vaishya merchant guilds. Wielding almost unchecked power over the nation’s economy, they have become a force to be reckoned with in [Root.GetAdjective] politics.\n\nSensing an opportunity to accumulate even greater power, the most powerful of these guilds have sent an embassy to [Root.Capital.GetName] with a series of polite but emphatic policy recommendations. Our financial advisors see some commercial merit to these policies, but note that they entail granting an outrageous degree of autonomy to the provinces where the guilds are most powerful, essentially making them into merchant-princes. Refusing these demands would anger the guilds greatly, though it would go a long way towards curtailing their power.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]授予了吠舍商会许多的特权与让步。他们毫无节制得操控着国家经济，已成为[Root.GetAdjective]政治中一股不可低估的力量。\n\n这些行会中最强大的商会意识到有机会积累更大的权力，便向[Root.Capital.GetName]派遣了一位使节，并提出了一系列彬彬有礼却强硬有力的政策建议。我们的商业顾问认为这些政策存在一定的商业价值，但是请注意，他们需要被给予行会权力最强大的省份难以容忍的自治度，这会使他们成为商业巨头。拒绝这些要求会大大地激怒商会，但是有助于削减他们的权利。

original: The Deccan Plateau is a dry and rugged land, requiring regular investment in its frontier settlements to be profitable to the state. Decades of neglect and a series of unexpected droughts in [drylands_province.GetName] have led to poor harvests, a steady decline in land revenue, and a trend towards migration away from the drylands and towards the wealthy cities of the coast.\n\nThe situation in [drylands_province.GetName] could however be reversed through the construction of canals and water tanks, ensuring enough water to allow the population to grow and for agriculture to expand. While this would end the stagnation in [drylands_province.GetName], it would draw our focus away from our coastal trading settlements. We must consider which is more valuable to us at the present time.
translation: 德干高原是一片干燥而崎岖的土地，需要定期投资其边境定居点才能为该州带来利润。[drylands_province.GetName]数十年的疏忽和一系列意外旱灾导致收成不佳，土地收成持续下降，百姓不断从干旱地区逃难到沿海富裕城市。\n\n好消息是，[drylands_province.GetName]的情况可以通过兴建灌溉渠和储水池来扭转，从而确保有足够的水以使人口增长和农业扩张。然而，这虽然能够结束[drylands_province.GetName]的发展停滞，却会使得我们的注意力无法投入到沿海的贸易结算。我们必须考虑哪个更有价值。

original: Build water tanks and canals to restore [drylands_province.GetName]
translation: 修筑储水池和灌溉渠以重建[drylands_province.GetName]

original: Our coastal cities are much more profitable.
translation: 我们的沿海城市更有利可图。

original: [Root.GetAdjective] society is increasingly becoming more concerned with trade, industry, and profit than on martial endeavors. Many nobles, especially from the ranks of the Kshatriya warrior castes, are concerned that our nation is becoming soft and ill-prepared for war as Princes prefer to devote themselves to commerce rather than military studies. Representatives of the Vaishya caste argue not only that war is bad for business, but that a nation without full coffers cannot wage war effectively. We must decide whether to promote a mercantile or a martial society.
translation: [Root.GetAdjective]社会越来越关注贸易、工业和利润，而不是军事努力。许多贵族，特别是刹帝利战士种姓，担心我们的国家变得软弱，没有为战争做好准备，因为王公们更愿意投身于商业而不是军事研究。吠舍种姓的代表则认为战争不利于商业贸易，而且在国库还不充足的情况下不宜贸然发动战争。我们必须决定要促进商业社会还是军事社会。

original: Strive towards a more mercantile society.
translation: 努力建立一个更加商业化的社会。

original: The Rajputs are refusing to accept the confiscation of their property in [Root.GetName] and have risen in revolt against us!
translation: 拉杰普特人拒绝我们没收其[Root.GetName]的财产，并且掀起了叛乱！
提高拉杰普特人的权力

original: The Rajputs have seen their influence increase in [Root.Country.GetName]. The machinations of a well-connected aristocracy, a strong sense of kin identity, and a growing reputation as indomitable warriors have all contributed to their rising power. We can expect the Rajputs to play a greater role in [Root.GetAdjective] affairs in the immediate future.
translation: 拉杰普特人在[Root.Country.GetName]的影响力日益增长。关系良好的贵族、具有强烈血缘认同的亲属以及以不屈不挠而声名鹊起的战士，这些人的阴谋诡计都为他们崛起的力量做出了贡献。我们可以期待，不久的将来，拉杰普特人会在[Root.GetAdjective]事务中发挥更大的作用。

original: A series of internecine struggles brought about by feuding kin groups has weakened Rajput influence in [Root.Country.GetName]. Unable or unwilling to devote their full attention to [Root.GetAdjective] political or military affairs, their influence at court has very much suffered.
translation: 拉杰普特内部发生的一系列自相争斗，削弱了他们在[Root.Country.GetName]的影响力。不能或者不愿意专注于[Root.GetAdjective]政治军事事务，他们在朝堂上的影响力也大打折扣。

original: Kinship is of paramount importance to the Rajput clans, and as such there is no better way to cement their loyalty than by forging marriage alliances. Several of the most powerful Rajput thakurs have offered to wed their daughters into our line in exchange for a guarantee that they will continue to hold their ancestral lands and titles. Though some among the Rajput leaders consider this an unacceptable act of sublimation, those that have offered marriage ties do so with plans to advance their position at court.
translation: 血缘关系对拉杰普特人至关重要，因此没有比联姻更好的方法来确保他们的忠诚了。几个最强大的拉杰普特塔库尔提议将他们的女儿加入我们的血脉，以换取他们将继续保留世袭领地和头衔的保证。尽管一些拉其普特头领认为这是一种不可接受的升华行为，但那些提供婚姻关系的人会这样做，并计划提升他们在宫廷中的地位。
让他们考虑我们的亲属。
我们不需要它们的友谊。
拉杰普特的后裔寻找新的领地

original: Rajput power in India is predicated on centuries of conquest, colonization, and settlement of lands beyond their power base in Rajasthan. A particularly bold and ambitious scion of a notable clan has appeared at court on a quest to enhance the prestige of his kin. Approaching the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], he asks permission to settle [rajput_scion_province.GetName], where he shall found a new town. He promises in exchange to accept the rule of the [Root.Country.GetName] state and to raise an army in our support whenever it is needed.
translation: 几个世纪以来，印度的拉杰普特政权建立在拉贾斯坦军事力量的征服、殖民和定居的基础上。一个出身显赫部族且特别大胆而又野心勃勃的贵族子弟以客卿的身份出现在宫廷，他希望为他的家族提高威望。他接近[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]并要求得到在[rajput_scion_province.GetName]定居的许可，他将在那建造一个新的城镇。作为交换，他承诺将接受[Root.Country.GetName]的统治并在我们有需要的时候提供军事支持。

original: Allow him to take over the province and found a new settlement.
translation: 允许他们接管省份并建立新的定居点。

original: We can administer these lands perfectly well ourselves.
translation: 我们自己可以很好地管理这些土地。

original: Rajput nobles have come to both outnumber and outrank all other nobility at the [Root.GetAdjective] court. They know well the power they wield over our armies and our administration, and have leveraged this power to demand extreme concessions to Rajput nobles and their territories. Our attempts to curb their power through subtle means have had little effect, and so we must consider taking drastic action; either we must accept that the Rajputs are a law unto themselves, or we must strip them of their noble ranks to restore balance to the court.
translation: 在[Root.GetAdjective]宫廷上，拉杰普特贵族和人数和地位已远远超过所有其他贵族。他们深知自己对军队和政府的掌控，并利用这种权力要求对拉杰普特贵族及其领地做出极大的让步。我们试图通过温和的手段限制他们的权力，但收效甚微。因此我们必须考虑采取严厉的措施；要么接受拉杰普特人的目无法纪、为所欲为，要么剥夺他们的贵族身份以恢复法庭的平衡。

original: We will allow them to govern themselves, for now.
translation: 我们将暂时允许他们自治。

original: Curb their power, strip the leaders of rank and title!
translation: 遏制他们的力量，剥夺领导者的爵位和头衔！

original: Rajput nobles are a common sight at the court of [Root.Country.GetName], though it is becoming increasingly difficult to distinguish between them and the other courtiers that make their home in [Root.Capital.GetName]. The Rajputs at court have been thoroughly integrating into [Root.GetAdjective] aristocratic society, going so far as to learn the Persian language, observe [Root.GetAdjective] courtly etiquette, and personally accompany the [Root.Monarch.GetName] wherever [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] goes. This is leading to the loss of a distinctly Rajput voice at court, as these nobles have become more concerned with their personal advancement than in the interests of the Rajput community.
translation: 拉杰普特贵族在[Root.Country.GetName]的朝廷上随处可见，但是现在已经很难将他们与其他在[Root.Capital.GetName]安家的朝臣区分开来了。 拉其普特人已经彻底融入[Root.GetAdjective]的贵族社会。他们甚至开始学习波斯语，模仿[Root.GetAdjective]的宫廷礼仪，并亲自随侍[Root.Monarch.GetName]。拉杰普特人在朝廷上已经不再享有话语权，因为这些贵族更关心他们的个人权力而不是整个拉杰普特社区的利益。
罗阇富多佣兵团的暴动

original: Relations between [Root.Country.GetName] and the Rajput clans could hardly be worse. The marginalization of Rajput nobles and the neglect of Rajput soldiers has created an atmosphere of resentment and distrust that now threatens to erupt into violent conflict. Though it has become traditional for the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] to formally appoint Rajput clan leaders, in the current state of crisis our preferred candidate has been unanimously rejected by his would-be subjects. The Rajputs of [Root.Country.GetName] now demand the right to appoint their own leadership, and to be left to govern their own affairs in provinces they control. They are prepared to install their chosen leader by force if we insist on maintaining our chokehold on dynastic politics.
translation: [Root.Country.GetName]与拉杰普特家族关系急剧恶化。拉杰普特贵族的边缘化以及对拉杰普特姓士兵的忽视使得怨恨与不信任的氛围四处弥漫，这带来了叛乱的威胁。尽管[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]指派拉杰普特部落领袖已成为传统，但在目前的危机下，我们青睐的候选者已被其将来的臣民一致拒绝。[Root.Country.GetName]的拉杰普特人要求自由选举他们的领袖，并且寻求在其控制的省份内自治。如果我们坚持王朝的遏制政策，他们可能会强行扶植自己的领袖。

original: We must avoid conflict. Grant them autonomy.
translation: 我们必须避免冲突。给予他们自治权。

original: Force them to accept our rule.
translation: 强迫他们接受我们的规则

original: The cornerstone of Rajput identity is their Dharma, which they derive from the moral guidance in their bardic writings. Every Rajput leader must put kinship above all else, surrounding himself with a brotherhood of warriors and advisors all sharing descent from a patrilineal ancestor. Rajput soldiers must fight and die in service to their masters; nothing but absolute loyalty is acceptable.\n\nRather than attempting to suppress these traditional Rajput values and power structures, [Root.Country.GetName] has encouraged them, harmonizing them with service to the state and the [Root.Monarch.GetName]. The Rajputs see no contradiction between their Dharma and their duty to us.
translation: 拉杰普特人自我认同的基础是他们的律法，律法是一套从吟游诗中衍生出的道德准则。每个拉吉普特领主都必须把血统放在首位，只有有着共同祖先的战士和顾问才能在朝廷任职。拉杰普特武士都必须忠于自己的主人，为他们而战，并为他们而死。\n\n[Root.Country.GetName]并没有试图压制这些拉杰普特人传统的价值观和权力结构，而是推行它们，并它们将与对国家与[Root.Monarch.GetName]的侍奉协调起来。拉杰普特认为他们的律法和对我们义务没有矛盾。

original: Rajput service to the [Root.GetAdjective] state is founded on the unspoken understanding that the Rajputs should be allowed to practice their traditional Hindu religion and face no penalties for failing to convert to Islam.\nLeaders of the $ESTATE_CHURCH$ have recently become particularly insistent on our adherence to Sharia, demanding that we pressure Rajput leaders to convert and penalize Hindu nobles by restricting their ranks and privileges.\nThough a small number of Rajput nobles have converted, the overwhelming majority are outraged by the $ESTATE_CHURCH$’s actions. They have petitioned the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] for an immediate guarantee of religious tolerance, demanding that their traditions and customs be respected by law.
translation: 拉吉普特对[Root.GetAdjective]州服务的前提是，允许拉吉普特人进行传统印度教活动并且不会因为未皈依伊斯兰教而受到惩罚。\n而$ESTATE_CHURCH$的领导人最近特别坚持我们对伊斯兰教法的遵循，要求我们向拉吉普特领导人施加压力，通过限制他们的爵位和特权来皈依和惩罚印度教贵族。\n虽然少数拉吉普特贵族已经改信，但绝大多数人都对$ESTATE_CHURCH$的行为感到愤怒。他们请求[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]立即保证宗教宽容，他们的传统和习俗应该受到法律的尊重。

original: Guarantee religious tolerance and scold the $ESTATE_CHURCH$.
translation: 确保宗教宽容并且斥责$ESTATE_CHURCH$

original: Pressure Rajput nobles to convert to [Root.Religion.GetName].
translation: 强迫拉杰普特贵族改信[Root.Religion.GetName]

original: Rajput nobility has spread far and wide throughout the centuries, but a strong sense of kinship identity creates a common aristocratic culture. Rajput chiefs know their status and history in relation to other Rajputs going back many generations.\n\nOur advisors, among them many Rajputs, suggest that these bonds could be exploited to the benefit of [Root.Country.GetName]. Most obviously, the Rajput chiefs loyal to us could act as ambassadors to the Rajputs of nearby nations, enhancing our reputation in foreign courts. A more cunning option would be to exploit ancient grudges among the Rajputs as a means to claim foreign territory.
translation: 几个世纪以来，拉杰普特贵族闻名遐迩，对血缘纽带的强烈认同感催生了一种共同的贵族文化。拉杰普特的首领们知道他们与其他拉杰普特人的身份地位和历史可以追溯到许多世代以前。\n\n我们之中许多出身拉杰普特的顾问建议可以利用这种联系，这将有助于[Root.Country.GetName]的利益。最显而易见的是，对于周边的拉杰普特诸邦国，忠于我们的拉杰普特首领可以充当我们的大使，提高我们在外国宫廷的声望。还有一个更狡黠的方法则是利用拉杰普特诸邦之间古老的仇恨，将其作为获得外国领土宣称的一种手段。

original: Refused to Marry into Rajput Families: §Y$VAL$%§!
translation: 拒绝嫁入拉杰普特家族: §Y$VAL$§!
拉杰普特贵族子弟被授予土地: §Y$VAL$%§!
拉杰普特贵族子弟拒绝土地: §Y$VAL$%§!
融合拉杰普特贵族受挫: §Y$VAL$%§!
通过法令任命的拉杰普特首领: §Y$VAL$%§!
受尊重的拉杰普特印度教徒: §Y$VAL$%§!
拉杰普特在朝堂上被削弱: §Y$VAL$%§!
对拉杰普特贵族的让步: §Y$VAL$%§!

original: Despite their pacifist principles, the local Jain population of the [Root.GetName] province have taken up arms against us due to the revocation of their privileges!
translation: 尽管持有和平主义原则，[Root.GetName]省的耆那教人群因为特权被取消，已经拿起武器反抗我们。

original: Many influential Jains have found a home in the court of [Root.Country.GetName]. Jain ascetics, bankers, and merchants alike have the ear of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. There are even rumours that [Root.Monarch.GetName] [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] has joined in Jain rituals. Though a small religious minority, the Jains are gaining power in politics and society.
translation: 许多有影响力的耆那教徒已经在[Root.Country.GetName]朝中有一席之地。耆那教的苦行者、银行家、商人都在[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]那里说得上话。甚至有谣言说[Root.Monarch.GetName][Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]已经加入耆那教仪式。耆那教徒尽管是少数宗教群体，但是在政治和社会上正在获得权力。

original: The Jains once again find themselves lacking in social capital. Prominent ascetics have managed to get themselves exiled from court following a series of religious and political disagreements, and Jain merchants find their fortunes are waning. Jain influence is on the decline.
translation: 耆那教徒再次发现他们缺乏社会资本。在一系列宗教和政治分歧之后，显赫的修道者设法让自己从朝廷中被驱逐出来，而耆那教商人的财富正在逐渐减少。耆那教的影响正在下降。

original: The Jain community of [Root.Country.GetName] have become utterly disloyal following many acts of disrespect and persecution by the state. The situation has become great exacerbated by an outrageous act of sacrilege. One of our [Root.Religion.GetName] governors marched into a Jain temple, slaughtered a cow, and desecrated the noses of all the icons inside. Unwilling to accept further persecution, the Jain community has resolved to oppose our government. Their methods of resistance are unorthodox yet effective; rather than rising up in violent rebellion they boycott institutions of state, deny loans, and refuse all participation in government. Our reliance on the Jain community has become a damning vulnerability.
translation: [Root.Country.GetName]的耆那教社区由于许多不尊重的行为和国内的迫害而变得完全不忠诚。一个粗暴的亵渎行为加剧了这种情况。我们中一位[Root.Religion.GetName]的总督闯入了一座耆那教寺庙，宰了一头母牛，并毁坏了里面所有神像上的鼻子。不甘忍受如此变本加厉的迫害，耆那教社区断然决定反抗我们的统治。他们的抵抗手段非同寻常但行之有效：不是通过暴力叛乱，而是联合抵制政府机构、拒绝提供贷款或是反对参与一切行政事务。我们对耆那教社区的依赖成了我们致命的弱点。
至少他们是和平主义者。
耆那教放债人收回债务

original: Several prominent Vaishya guilds have accumulated substantial debts to Jain banking families. Unwilling to pay up, representatives of these guilds have petitioned the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] for forgiveness of their debt. They argue that their finances will be ruined if they are forced to continue making payments, though the Jain moneylenders retort that their inability to pay is due to their own mismanagement. How shall we handle this dispute?
translation: 一些著名的吠舍行会对耆那教银行家族积累了大量债务。这些行会的代表们不愿偿还，已经上书了[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]请求豁免他们的债务。他们争辩说，如果被迫继续偿付那么他们的财务就会破产，尽管耆那教的放债人反驳拖欠是由于他们的经营不善。我们该如何解决这个争端？

original: The guilds must pay their debt.
translation: 行会必须偿还他们的债务。

original: The Jains must forgive the debt.
translation: 耆那教徒必须免除这些债务。

original: We shall settle the debt ourselves.
translation: 我们应该自己解决这些债务。
耆那教银行家与婆罗门银行家

original: While [Root.Country.GetName] typically relies on Jain banking families to finance state loans, the Jains are far from the only financiers in the realm. Several Brahmin families also engage in banking. Representatives of these Brahmins argue the case for favoring their services over the Jains. While they cannot offer the same low interest rates, they stress that the confidence of the Hindu people in Brahmin leadership will correspond to increased faith in the [Root.GetAdjective] economy.
translation: [Root.Country.GetName]通常依赖于耆那教银行家族为国家贷款提供资金，但是耆那教徒远非该领域唯一的投资家。几个婆罗门家族也从事银行业务，这些婆罗门的代表认为支持他们的服务更有利。虽然他们无法提供一样的低利率，但是他们强调，印度教徒对婆罗门的领导的信心将促进[Root.GetAdjective]经济。

original: Jain bankers have served us perfectly well.
translation: 耆那教的银行家为我们提供了很好的服务。

original: Let us favor the Brahmins instead.
translation: 让我们转而支持婆罗门。

original: A Generous Donation from the Jains
translation: 来自耆那教徒的慷慨捐赠

original: The [Root.GetAdjective] state has allied with a number of wealthy Jain families. They have been granted positions in the administration, control over Jain pilgrimage sites, and preferential treatment in the taxation system. Our heavy patronage has at last paid off; they have offered us the service of a number of skilled financiers to aid our administration, and donated a large sum to our coffers. The workings of the state now run as smoothly as they ever have.
translation: [Root.GetAdjective]的国家已经和一定数量的富有耆那教家族有了同盟关系。他们被授予行政职位并且管控耆那教徒的朝圣地点以及在税收体系中享受优惠待遇。我们巨大的投入终于得到了回报：他们向我们提供了一批专业的金融家协助我们的行政，并且在我们的国库中捐赠了一大笔钱。现在国家机器的运转真是前所未有的平稳和顺利。
受青睐的耆那教银行家: §Y$VAL$%§!
受青睐的婆罗门银行家: §Y$VAL$%§!
耆那教徒占据行政部门: §Y$VAL$%§!

original: Paryushana marks the holiest period of the Jain religious calendar. It is a time of fasting, austerity, and absolution. Members of the Jain community use this time for prayer, meditation, and asking forgiveness from their fellows.\nJain ministers employed in the [Root.GetAdjective] administration have petitioned the state to ask that the slaughter of animals be prohibited for the duration of Paryushana. While a costly proposal for our butchers, it has been suggested that the state could make up for the loss of profit.
translation: 帕鲁沙纳是耆那教最神圣的节日。这是关于禁食、简朴和豁免的节日。耆那教社区的成员在这段时间进行祈祷、冥想并请求他们的同伴宽恕。\n[Root.GetAdjective]政府中雇用的耆那教部长上书要求在帕鲁沙纳期间禁止屠宰动物。虽然这对我们的屠夫来说是一个昂贵的建议，但有人提议国家可以弥补损失的利益。
在帕鲁沙纳期间禁止屠宰动物。

original: We will not make concessions to heathen faiths.
translation: 我们不会对异教信仰做出让步。

original:
While heathen religions can be tolerated, there is no place in [Root.Country.GetName] for kafirs who believe in no God at all. The $ESTATE_CHURCH$ has charged the Jains with being kafirs, non-believers in God, and have held a debate before the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] to settle the matter.

The $ESTATE_CHURCH$ argue that the Jains hold no belief in one who is pure, without physical form, changeless, sinless, emancipated from rebirth, passionless, independent, a slayer of sins, and the architect of all joy. This conception of God, they argue, is shared between Muslims and Hindus but absent among Jains.

The Jain monks present at the debate fervently repudiate this view. Opting for flexibility, they put forth a multitude of Jain doctrines to demonstrate their theism from the worship of Jina to the very concept of Dharma.

Ultimately, it falls upon the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] to decide the fate of Jainism in [Root.Country.GetName]. We must consider which argument we find most compelling.
translation:
即使异教信仰能够被容忍，那些完全不信主的卡菲勒在[Root.Country.GetName]绝没有容身之处。$ESTATE_CHURCH$已经指控那些耆那教徒都是不信主的卡菲勒，在[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]解决这个问题前，他们已经进行了一场辩论。

$ESTATE_CHURCH$坚持认为那些耆那教徒否认真主的独一性，即无形的、永恒的、纯洁无瑕的、从新生中解放的、没有感情的、独一的、罪孽的清除者和万物的造物主。他们争论这些概念在穆斯林和印度教徒之间是共通的，而耆那教徒却不在意这些。

与会的耆那教僧侣强烈否认这个主张。从崇拜圣人到遵循律法教规，他们灵活地阐述了大量耆那教教义从而论证他们的神学理论。

最终，将由[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]来决定[Root.Country.GetName]耆那教徒的命运。我们必须考虑哪一个主张更有说服力。

original: The Jains are theists, as we are.
translation: 耆那教徒和我们一样也是有神论者。

original: The Jains are kafirs, they believe in no God.
translation: 耆那教徒都是卡菲尔，他们信仰的不是神。
耆那教徒被认定为有神论者: §Y$VAL$%§!
耆那教徒被认定为不信道者: §Y$VAL$%§!
耆那教徒要求在宗教上作出妥协

original: Representatives of the [Root.GetAdjective] Jain community appear before the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] with a proposal; cement the status of Jainism in both state and society in exchange for the undying loyalty of the community. They mean to achieve this status through the enactment of policies granting religious concessions. These would include the prohibition of animal slaughter, ending the confiscation of the property of the deceased, abolishing religious taxes, and the release of political prisoners with ties to prominent Jain families.\n\nThese proposals have been met with outrage from the [Root.Religion.GetName] clergy, and are likely to be unpopular throughout the realm. It may be time to sever our close alliance with the Jains.
translation: 一位[Root.GetAdjective]的耆那教社区代表出现在[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]面前，提议巩固耆那教在国家和社会中的地位从而换取社区的永久忠诚。他们希望我们能够颁布一个宗教妥协的政策从而获得地位。这些措施包括禁止宰杀动物、禁止没收死者财产、取消宗教税以及释放某些显要耆那教家族的政治犯。\n\n这些提议已经使得[Root.Religion.GetName]的神职人员愤怒不已，并且多半在整个王国内也不受欢迎。也许是时候与我们亲密的耆那教盟友划清界限了。

original: They have gone too far. Time to cut ties.
translation: 他们做得太过分了，是时候与他们撇清关系了。

original: [Root.jain_advisor.GetName], a wealthy statesman of the Jain faith, has long been a close ally and confidant to [Root.Monarch.GetName]. Through years of service to the [Root.GetAdjective] nation, [Root.jain_advisor.GetName] has proven not only that he is loyal beyond reproach, but also that he is a skilled administrator and military strategist. [Root.jain_advisor.GetName] would be best able to continue serving the state if we were to formally grant him the title of Peshwa, the office of prime minister.
translation: 一位富有的耆那教政治家[Root.jain_advisor.GetName]，长期以来一直是[Root.Monarch.GetName]的亲密盟友和得力助手。通过多年来侍奉[Root.GetAdjective]的国家，[Root.jain_advisor.GetName]不仅证明了他的忠诚无可指摘，而且他还是一个出色的管理者和军事战略家。如果我们想要正式授予一个人佩什瓦（即宰相）的头衔，[Root.jain_advisor.GetName]将会是最好的人选。

original: Appoint [Root.jain_advisor.GetName] with a lesser title instead.
translation: 用一个更小的职位委派[Root.jain_advisor.GetName]

original: The Marathas are refusing to accept the confiscation of their property in [Root.GetName] and have risen in revolt against us!
translation: 马拉塔人拒绝接受在[Root.GetName]对他们没收财产，他们已经起义反抗我们！
马拉塔诗人质疑婆罗门的权威

original:
A great poet has emerged from among the Marathi people. Hailed as a living saint, the poet preaches equality before the gods and defiance of caste restrictions. He writes of the Brahmins:

'Vishnu’s servants have no caste,
The Veda’s science so decrees.
Which of your books have saved the fallen?
I know of none.'

Arguing that a man is only as chaste as his own faith and emphasizing personal salvation over ritual observances, his teachings have angered the Brahmins of [Root.Country.GetName]. They demand that the poet must drown his works in the river and make a formal apology for his unorthodoxy.
translation:
马拉塔人中出现了一位伟大的诗人。这位被尊称为「活圣徒」的诗人在众神面前宣扬平等，并蔑视种姓制。他的诗中这样描写婆罗门：

「毗湿奴的侍奉者没有种姓」，
吠陀经的教条中如此写道。
你们的哪本书拯救了堕落者？
我一本也不知道。

他认为一个人只需要忠于自己的信仰，并且强调个人救赎而不是宗教仪式，他的教诲激怒了[Root.Country.GetName]的婆罗门。 他们要求诗人必须把他的作品投入河里，并为他的异端言论做出正式的道歉。

original: Facing an enemy that fields powerful artillery, our Maratha advisors propose the adoption of a tactic that has served them well in the past. Named ‘bargi-giri’ by northern invaders after the Marathi term for horsemen, it is a form of guerrilla warfare that favors highly mobile cavalry flanking maneuvers. The smaller, lighter horses favored by Deccanis are ideal for such missions, able to outmaneuver cumbersome artillery, elephants, and heavy cavalry.
translation: 对阵集中了优势火炮的敌人时，我们的马拉塔顾问建议我们采用一种他们曾经用过的古老而有效的战术。这种战术被北方入侵者称为「巴吉-吉里」，源于骑兵的马拉地语——「巴格尔」。这种游击战术依赖高机动骑兵进行侧翼战术机动。因此深受德干人喜爱的小型马非常适合执行这种任务。这种小型马能够甩开笨重的炮兵、大象和重骑兵。
为巴尔吉尔准备的马匹

original: The Bargirs, Maratha cavalrymen in [Root.Country.GetName]’s employ, traditionally have their horses provided for them by their patron. In recent months a decline in available mounts and a consequent rise in prices has made this a financially daunting prospect. The state could procure the necessary horses at an increased cost, but if the price proves unacceptable we may have to ask that the Bargirs meet the cost themselves.
translation: 巴尔吉尔，即[Root.Country.GetName]雇佣兵中的马拉塔骑手，传统上由雇主为他们提供马匹。最近几个月来，可用马匹的减少和价格的上涨使得财政非常窘迫。国家可以用更大的代价确保马匹的供应，但如果价格变得无法接受，我们会让那些巴尔吉尔自行解决花销问题。

original: The state shall provide the horses.
It is too expensive, they must buy their own steeds.
translation: 这太贵了，他们要自行准备马匹。

original: The Marathas bring with them a hardened martial culture to the lands they rule. They maintain close ties with the peasantry and lower castes, favoring an egalitarian outlook over a belief in the inherent worth of nobility. Unlike many Indian armies, which typically draw their manpower from the ranks of the nobility, the Marathas raise legions of peasant-soldiers skilled in guerrilla warfare. Though unendowed with the excellence of noble and illustrious birth, their martial experience makes them superior to the easy and effeminate troops of our enemies.
translation: 马拉塔人为他们统治的土地带来了一种固化的尚武精神。 他们与农民和低等种姓者保持着密切的关系。马拉塔人倾向于平等主义，而不是贵族的世袭特权。 与许多从贵族那里获得兵源的印度军队不同，马拉塔人使用擅长游击战的平民士兵组成军团。 虽然这些平民的出生并不显赫，但他们的军事经验使他们优于我们敌人软弱的军队。
穷兵黩武导致粮食短缺

original: The increasing militarization of Maratha society has ecological drawbacks. Where the peasantry once tended the fields, they now stand to gain easy riches by serving half the year as soldiers. Labor shortages plus an increasing demand for warhorses are making traditional agriculture difficult and unprofitable, making the land more vulnerable to famines. Many are turning towards pastoralism; cattle can be herded with a smaller labor force, can be driven into forests during a drought, or hidden in ravines in times of war. It may be necessary to scale back militarization in [maratha_farming_province.GetName], though the peasantry is unlikely to receive this news well.
translation: 日益军事化的马拉塔社会有着生态上的不利条件。过去农民曾在田地耕种，可现在他们通过服半年兵役来获取更轻松的收入。劳动力的短缺加上对战马的需求让传统农业变得艰难且无利可图，使得土地更易遭受饥荒。许多人转向了畜牧业，放牧只需更少的劳力，牲畜可以在旱期被驱入森林或在战时藏入山谷。也许有必要在[maratha_farming_province.GetName]缩减军事规模，即便农民不太喜欢听到这个消息。

original: Tell the peasants to return to their fields.
Bring in landless peasants to grow the crops.

translation: 马拉塔人发展出了昂贵的品味

original: [Root.Country.GetName]’s campaigns in India have brought glory to the Marathas that we entrust to lead our military. Many of these soldiers are returning home with a newfound taste for the luxuries of Persianate culture; Bengali silks, Persian-style paintings, elaborate works of brass and silver are now in high demand. As the Marathas wield great influence in [Root.Country.GetName], the Maratha nobility have approached the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] asking for state patronage of these arts and procurement of exotic goods.
translation: [Root.Country.GetName]在印度的战役给我们委任带领军队的马拉塔人带来了荣耀。这些士兵中的许多人在返乡时带去了许多波斯文化的奇珍异宝：孟加拉丝绸、波斯风格的绘画，现在精雕细琢的铜器和银器供不应求。在[Root.Country.GetName]，当马拉塔人具有巨大影响力的时候，马拉塔贵族已经接近[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]并要求国家赞助采购这些异域珍宝。

original: A little culture never hurt anyone.
translation: 微不足道的文化无伤大雅。

original: We will not bankroll Persian decadence.
translation: 我们不会为堕落的波斯文化掏一分钱。

original: Palkhis and the Cult of Vithoba
translation: 帕尔基和维陀巴的崇拜

original: A tradition of pilgrimage centered around the Cult of Vithoba has become popular among the Marathas. These processions are known as palkhis, occurring simultaneously across many Marathi settlements in India and culminating at the temple of Vithoba in Pandharpur. Palkhis form part of the Marathi egalitarian tradition; all Marathas regardless of caste walk side by side, taking with them the simple sandals of a venerated Poet-Saint.\n\nSome among the Brahmins see these non-hierarchical spiritual movements as a threat to their religious authority. They seek to gain a measure of control over the palkhis so that they can be integrated into orthodox Hindu worship in accordance with their interpretation of Vedic ritual.
translation: 朝圣一直以来都是维陀巴崇拜的传统，这种朝圣被马拉塔人称为帕尔基（palkhis）：维陀巴的信徒们从印度的各个马拉塔社区同时出发，最后聚集到位于潘达尔普尔的维陀巴神庙。朝圣，或者说帕尔基，构成了马拉塔平等主义传统的一部分，所有的信徒都如同诗歌中的圣人一般穿着简单的草鞋，不分等级或出身并肩而行。\n\n一些婆罗门认为这种无视种姓与阶级的精神运动是对他们宗教权威的威胁。 他们希望对帕尔基进行一定程度的控制，以便他们根据吠陀经的释义将帕尔基融入到正统的印度教中。

original: Palkhis shall remain in the hands of the people.
translation: 帕尔基将留在人民手中。

original: Formalize the event with Brahmin guidance.
translation: 让婆罗门把这个活动仪式化。

original:
Every owned province with the §YMarathas§! estate or with §YMaratha§! culture gets §Y'Popular Palkhis'§! for §Y20 years§!, giving the following effects:
Local Unrest: §G-3.00§!
Local Development Cost: §G-5.0%§!
Monthly Devastation: §G-0.03§!
translation:
名下所有拥有§Y马拉塔§!阶层或者属于§Y马拉塔§!文化的省份将得到为期§Y20年§!的§Y「受欢迎的帕尔基」§!，获得以下效果：
本地叛乱风险：§G-3.00§!
本地开发花费：§G-5.0%§!
每月荒废度：§G-0.03§!

original: The influence of the Marathas in [Root.Country.GetName] has waned of late. Dynastic infighting and disorganization have distracted many Maratha leaders from their duties to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], and as such they wield lesser power at court.
translation: [Root.Country.GetName]马拉塔人的影响力近来已经衰弱不堪。王朝的的内讧和瓦解使得许多马拉塔领导人不再向[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]恪尽职守，因此他们在宫廷中失去了影响力。
马拉塔的影响正在上升

original: The Maratha military caste have risen from strength to strength in recent times. Their martial service and guidance has earned them a place of privilege in [Root.Country.GetName].
translation: 最近马拉塔武士阶层的势力在不断增强。他们在军事上的服务和引导为他们在[Root.Country.GetName]赢得了一些特权。

original: [Root.Country.GetName]'s relations with the Marathas have deteriorated to a dangerous level. Outraged by a slew of unfavorable policies and military decisions, their leaders have demanded much greater local control of the provinces we have entrusted to them and a relaxation of their duties to the state. Should we refuse, they have threatened to raise an army to enforce their demands.
translation: [Root.Country.GetName]与马拉塔人的关系已经到了一个危险的境地。不满和愤怒来自于一些令人不快的政策和军事决策，他们的领导人要求我们在委任他们统治的省份上获得更多的自治权力以及对国家更少的责任义务。如果我们拒绝，他们威胁征募一支军队来强制执行他们的诉求。

original: We cannot risk angering them further.
translation: 我们不能冒着进一步激怒他们的风险。

original: They cannot be allowed to abandon their duties.
translation: 不能允许他们放弃自己的职责。

original: The Deccan is a huge region and its administration is in many ways holding us back. Some would argue that the best way to efficiently rule the vast expanse of Southern India is to move our entire court to the old fort of Daulatabad.\nOthers suggest a simpler solution. We could appoint a viceroy to rule the entire region for us, freeing us up to expand elsewhere.
translation: 德干地区广阔，对它的行政管理在很大程度上是在拖累我们。有些人主张说，有效统治南印度广阔疆域的最好方法是把我们的整个宫廷都迁到道拉塔巴德的古堡中。\n其他人则提出了更简单的方法。我们可以委派一位总督统治这个地区，使得我们可以腾出手来继续保持扩张。

original: We will rule the empire from the south.
translation: 我们将从南方统治帝国。

original: Let us appoint a viceroy of the Deccan.
translation: 让我们任命一个德干的总督。

original: §RThis will release all your Southern Indian provinces as a very loyal vassal.§!
translation: §R这将会释放我们所有的南印度省份作为忠诚的附庸国§!

original: As the commander of Golconda surrenders to the [Root.GetAdjective] armies he also hands over the treasury kept within the walls of the legendary fort. Diamonds in all sizes, many of them with their own names, have been quickly dispatched towards the treasury in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName].\nThe greatest diamond market in the world is now in [Root.GetAdjective] hands...
translation: 作为戈尔孔达的指挥官向[Root.GetAdjective]的军队投降，同时也意味着他把铜墙铁壁守护着的宝库拱手送出。各种大小不一的钻石，其中许多带有独特的名字，都已经迅速地被送到了[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的国库。\n世界上最大的钻石市场现在已经落入了[Root.GetAdjective]之手。
§G点击以把$AREA|Y$从镇压区域中移除§!\n

original: §RNeither you nor any valid Subjects own provinces in the $AREA|Y$ area.§!\n
translation: §R你与任意属国都未在$AREA|Y$区域中拥有省份§!\n

original: §RArmies can only Suppress Rebels if located in a province owned by you or a valid Subject.§!\n
translation: §R军队只能在一个属于你或你的合法附庸的省份镇压叛乱。§!\n

original: §RYou can only add areas that are adjacent to already Suppressed areas.§!
translation: §R您只能添加与已镇压地区相邻的地区。§!

original:
Total unrest reduction $TOTAL|G$:
Unrest reduction from regiments: $BASE|G$
Unrest reduction is modified by:
 Autonomous Rebel Suppression: $MULT$

Unrest reduction is spread evenly among provinces with unrest, reducing unrest with $PER_PROV|G$ in $PROVS|Y$ provinces.
Unrest can never be reduced by more than $MAX_UNREST_REDUCTION|G$ per province.
translation:
总叛乱度减少$TOTAL|G$：
军队镇压：$BASE|G$
叛乱度减少的修正因素：
  自动镇压叛乱：$MULT$

在拥有叛乱的省份间均匀地减少叛乱，在$PROVS|Y$个省份中减少了$PER_PROV|G$叛乱。
每个省份减少的叛乱不超过$MAX_UNREST_REDUCTION|G$。

original: Click the map to add/remove suppressed areas.
translation: 点击地图来增加或移除压制区。

original: You have enough Government Reform Progress to enact a Reform giving you permanent bonuses or mechanics.
translation: 你拥有足够的政府改革进度实施此项改革并获得永久性加成或机制。

original: Has reached level $LEVEL|Y$ in Government Reforms.\n
translation: 政府改革已经达到了第$LEVEL|Y$级。\n

original: Are you sure you want to enact the Government Reform $REFORM|Y$ for the cost of $COST|Y$ Government Reform Progress, giving you the following benefits:\n$BENEFITS$
translation: 你确定要实行政府改革$REFORM|Y$？这会减少$COST|Y$政府改革进度并会给你带来如下好处：\n$BENEFITS$

original: Enacting the Government Reform $REFORM|Y$ will remove $COST|Y$ of your Government Reform Progress and will give you the following benefits:\n$BENEFITS$
translation: 实行政府改革$REFORM|Y$会减少$COST|Y$政府改革进度并会给你带来如下好处：\n$BENEFITS$

original: §RNot enough Government Reform Progress to enact this reform.§!
translation: §R没有足够的政府改革进度来实施此项改革。§!

original: §RYou need to enact the previous tiers before enacting this reform.§!
translation: §R你在颁布这项改革前必须先颁布前一个等级的改革。§!

original: You can select this Government Reform at no cost, giving you the following benefits:\n$BENEFITS$
translation: 你可以免费选择一项政府改革，这将给你带来如下好处：\n$BENEFITS$

original: Changing to the Government Reform $REFORM|Y$ will add $COST|R$ Corruption to your country and give you the following benefits:\n$BENEFITS$
translation: 将政体改革变更为$REFORM|Y$将会使你的国家增加$COST|R$腐败度，并给予你如下加成：\n$BENEFITS$

original: \nNote that this Reform is only available to you as long as you fulfill the following conditions:\n$CONDITIONS$
translation: \n请注意，只有您满足以下条件，才能使用此改革：\n$CONDITIONS$

original: This Reform cannot be picked manually.
translation: 这一改革无法手动选择。

original: Are you sure you want to change to the Government Reform $REFORM|Y$? This will add $COST|R$ Corruption to your country and give you the following benefits:\n$BENEFITS$$POTENTIAL$
translation: 你确定要将你的政府改革变更为$REFORM|Y$吗？这将会使你的国家增加$COST|R$腐败度，并给予你以下增益效果：\n$BENEFITS$$POTENTIAL$

original: Are you sure you want to select the Government Reform $REFORM|Y$? This selection is free and will give you the following benefits:\n$BENEFITS$
translation: 你确定要选择政府改革$REFORM|Y$吗？你可以免费选择这项改革，并给予你以下增益效果：\n$BENEFITS$

original: You cannot change Government Reform if your corruption is over $MAXCORR|R$.
translation: 若本国腐败度高于$MAXCORR|R$则无法变更政府改革。

original: §RYou must reform your native government before you can enact Government Reforms.§!
translation: §R在制定政府改革之前，你必须改革你的土著政府。§!

original: §RYou must reform your Religion before you can enact Government Reforms.§!
translation: §R在实施政府改革之前，你必须完成原始宗教改革。§!

original: Spend one of your Upgrades to select one of the options.
translation: 使用一项升级来选择其中一个选项。

original: Select one of the options for free.
§RThis is a locked reform. If you select this reform you will not be able to switch to other reforms on the same Tier.§!\n
translation: §R这是一项锁定的改革。如果你选择了这项改革，你将无法切换到同一层的其他改革。§!\n

original: You can not select any of these.
translation: 无法选择其中的任何一项。

original: You need to enact the previous tiers before selecting any of these.
translation: 你在颁布这项改革前必须先选择其中任意一个。

original: You have $POINTS$ of reform progress: you need $REQPOINTS|Y$ to enact the next reform.
translation: 你的改革进度为$POINTS$：实施下一项改革需要$REQPOINTS|Y$。

original: You gain $POINTS|Y$ every month due to an average local autonomy of §Y$LOCALAUTONOMY$%§!. The lower the local autonomy is the faster you will gain reform points. Currently, you can keep at most $POINTS_CAP|Y$ saved.
translation: 根据你的平均地方自治度（§Y$LOCALAUTONOMY$%§!），你每月获得$POINTS|Y$改革进度。地方自治度越低，改革进度的获得速度越快。目前你最多可保有$POINTS_CAP|Y$改革进度。

original: Each tier of Reforms will increase the cost by §Y50§!
translation: 每增加一级，改革成本提高 §Y50§!。

original: Changing the government to $GOVERNMENT|Y$ will cost $COST|R$ Administrative power and give you the following benefits:\n$BENEFITS$
translation: 将政体变更为$GOVERNMENT|Y$将花费$COST|R$行政点数，并给予你以下收益：\n$BENEFITS$

original: Are you sure you want to change your government type to $GOVERNMENT|Y$? This will cost $COST|R$ of your Administrative power and give you the following benefits:\n$BENEFITS$
translation: 你确定要将你的政体类型变更为$GOVERNMENT|Y$？这将会消耗你$COST|R$行政点数，并给予你以下收益：\n$BENEFITS$

original: You need $COST|Y$ to change government, but you have only $CURRENT|R$.
translation: 你需要$COST|Y$来改变政体，但你只有$CURRENT|R$。

original: You need level $REQ_LEVEL|Y$ in Administrative Technology to change your government type to $GOV_NAME|Y$.
translation: 你需要等级为$REQ_LEVEL|Y$的行政科技以将你的政体类型改变为$GOV_NAME|Y$。

original: Change government is not allowed because:
translation: 不允许改变政府，原因如下：

original: §RNot enough Administrative power to change Government.§!
translation: §R没有足够的行政点数来改变政体。§!

original: We hold $OWNED|Y$ provinces out of $PROVINCES|Y$ of this culture. We need to hold them all to assimilate the culture.
translation: 我们持有这一文化所有$PROVINCES|Y$个省份中的$OWNED|Y$个。我们需要得到所有省份，以同化该文化。

original: $NAME|Y$ has been assimilated by owning all provinces, so it gives us no penalties.
translation: 因拥有所有该文化省份，$NAME|Y$已被同化，所以我们没有受到惩罚。

original: We hold $OWNED|Y$ provinces out of $PROVINCES|Y$ of this culture group. We need to hold them all to assimilate the culture group and get its effect.
translation: 我们持有这一文化组所有$PROVINCES|Y$个省份中的$OWNED|Y$个。我们需要得到所有省份，以同化该文化群体并取得相应效果。

original: The $GROUP|Y$ culture group contains the following cultures:\n
You cannot change your reform on this level due to the Reform $REFORM|Y$ being enacted.
translation: 由于已经通过了改革$REFORM|Y$，你无法改变这个级别的改革项目。

original: have been Assimilated by our government.
They will no longer pose a threat to our rule.
translation: 他们对我们的统治已经构不成威胁了。

original: When a culture group becomes assimilated.
have been assimilated by our government.
When a culture group is no longer considered Assimilated.
translation: 当一个文化组不再被视为同化文化时。

original: We have lost the effect of the $CULTURE_GROUP|Y$

Policies are powerful modifiers for your country that will last until you choose to remove them. We can maintain some for free, afterwards it will cost monthly monarch power. We can get more through ideas and government reforms.
translation: 政策能够给予你的国家强大的修正，在你移除它们前会持续生效。我们可以免费维护几项政策，额外的政策将每月消耗君主点数。我们可以通过理念和政府改革获得更多免费政策。

original: Policies are powerful modifiers for your country that will last until you choose to remove them. There is a limit on how many a country can maintain in one category at the same time which can be improved by ideas and government reforms.
translation: 政策是影响你的国家的强大修正，并将持续到你选择移除它们。一个国家可同时持有的同一类别的政策数量是有限的，这可以通过理念和政府改革来改善。
我们拥有$USED$/$MAX|Y$个激活的$ABILITY$政策栏。

original: We have $FREE|G$ free $ABILITY$ policy slot(s) and because of this we pay $COST|Y$ $POWERICON$ in monthly maintenance.
translation: 我们拥有$FREE|G$个免维护$ABILITY$政策栏，因此我们每月支付的维护费为$COST|Y$$POWERICON$。

original: $TAG|Y$ has less than $VAL|Y$ $INVESTMENT|Y$ Trade Company Investments in $REGION|Y$.
$TAG|Y$ has at least $VAL|Y$ $INVESTMENT|Y$ Trade Company Investments in $REGION|Y$.
Company men have established a defensive perimeter that can be easily supplied in the event of a siege.\n
translation: 贸易公司的人员已经建立了防御阵线，被围城时可以很容易地获得补给。\n

original: Company defenses in this area have been improved, creating a truly fortified position. A full garrison of Company soldiers can be supported to defend our investments.\n
translation: 该区域的贸易公司的防御得到了改善，建立了坚固的防御工事。足够支撑公司的全部驻军来保护我们的投资。\n

original: Suitable living quarters have been created for Company officers, from which they can command our military efforts in the area.\n
translation: 为贸易公司官员创造了合适的生活区域，他们可以从中指挥该地区的军事力量。\n

original: The Company Warehouse allows us to begin exploiting local resources in the area. It is a place to store and manage the goods we buy and sell in the area.\n
translation: 公司货栈允许我们开始开发该地区的本地资源。 这是一个存储和管理我们在该地区买卖的商品的地方。\n

original: A Warehouse on a larger scale, the Company Depot dominates the economic landscape of the area. Great quantities of goods are administered here by our logisticians.\n
translation: 作为一个规模较大的货栈，公司仓库主导了该地区的经济格局。 我们的后勤人员在这里管理大量货物。\n

original: The Company's naval command structure is based at the Admiralty. From here our naval officers can effectively administer a greater number of merchant vessels.\n
translation: 公司的海军指挥结构是参照海军部。 因此我们的海军军官可以有效地管理更多的商船。\n

original: The Broker's Office is the base of operations for negotiating trade deals with native producers. Our eagerness to purchase exotic goods encourages local producers to expand their operations.\n
translation: 中介办公室是与本地生产商谈判贸易协议的业务地点。 我们热衷购买异国产品，并鼓励当地生产商扩大经营。\n

original: Trade by and with the Company has become the focus of local production thanks to the expansion of the Broker's Exchange. Production in the area booms as our willingness to purchase local goods is almost boundless.\n
translation: 由于中介交易所的扩张，贸易公司间的交易已成为当地生产的焦点。我们几乎无限的购买意愿促进了该地区的生产蓬勃发展。\n

original: The Company has an insatiable need to purchase new land overseas. The Property Appraiser allows us to get that land at the lowest possible price, increasing our ability to control the flow of trade in the area.\n
translation: 公司贪婪地购买新的海外土地。 财产评估允许我们以尽可能低的价格获得该土地，从而提高我们控制该地区贸易流量的能力。\n

original: The Company Administration functions essentially like a small government. Charged with many duties, among the most importance assigned to the Administration is local recruitment into Company ranks.\n
translation: 公司管理部门的职能基本上就像一个小政府，被赋予许多职责，其中最重要的是招聘当地人加入公司。\n

original: Through a Military Administration, the Company is able to raise private armies from the local population. As the power of the Company increases, it begins to function almost as a militarized state in its own right.\n
translation: 得益于军事管理，贸易公司能够从本地人口中征募私兵。当公司攫取的权力增长时，它本身就开始如同一个军事化的国家起着作用。\n

original: Any illusions of native rule are dispelled with the establishment of the Governor General's Mansion. The Governor General's administration makes it clear that the Company is no mere merchant guild, but rather the true political power in this region.\n
translation: 所有关于地区自治的幻想都随着总督府的建立破灭了。总督府释放出了一个明确信号，那就是特许贸易公司不仅是一个商会，还是统治该地区的政治实体。\n

original: §RYou need to have a Trade Company with a province in the $AREA|Y$ area to make a Trade Company Investment here.\n§!
translation: §R您需要在$AREA|Y$地区设立一个贸易公司，以便在这里进行贸易公司投资。\n§!

original: §RYou have already Invested in $NAME|Y$ in the $AREA|Y$ area.§!
Making a $NAME|Y$ Trade Company Investment in $AREA|Y$ will cost $COST|Y$¤ and give the following bonuses:\n\n$MODS$
translation: $NAME|Y$贸易公司投资$AREA|Y$将花费$COST|Y$¤并给予以下奖励：\n\n$MODS$

original: Mild seasonal rain is falling, fertilizing the ground but increasing the difficulty of travel.
translation: 温和的季雨正在降临，肥沃了大地，但也增加了旅行的难度。

original: The Monsoon season is in full swing as torrential rain falls from the sky.
translation: 随着暴雨从天而降，季风季节如火如荼。

original: Extreme wind and rainfall make this province very difficult to traverse.
translation: 大风和强降雨使得这个地区难以通行。

original: Ask the country to sell a province that will become a Trade Company.
translation: 要求这个国家出售一个能够成为贸易公司的省份。

original: You can't ask for charter company when at war
translation: 当一方处于战争时你不能要求特许贸易公司

original: Requesting charter company requires at least $PRICE$¤ and you only have $OWNED$¤
translation: 建立特许贸易公司需要至少$PRICE$¤而你只有$OWNED$¤。

original: You can't ask for charter company in a province that you have not discovered yet.
translation: 你不能在一个你还未发现的省份上申请建立特许贸易公司。

original: The selected country is not the controller of this province anymore
translation: 所选国家不再是该省份的控制者

original: You cannot select a province in the same continent of your capital province
translation: 不能选择与首都同大陆的省份

original: You cannot request charter company in a province that is already part of a trade company
translation: 你不能在一个已成为特许贸易公司的省份上申请建立特许贸易公司。

original: Only Independent or Tributary nations can request to charter company.
translation: 只有独立国家或朝贡国才能申请建立特许贸易公司。

original: It is possible to ask for charter company only to Independent or Tributary nations.
translation: 你只能向独立国家或朝贡国要求特许贸易公司。
$REGIMENT_TYPE|Y$军团的数量（$REGIMENTS|Y$支）等于$ESTATE|Y$阶层的省份数（$PROVS|Y$个）。\n
$REGIMENT_TYPE|Y$军团的数量（$REGIMENTS|Y$支）少于$ESTATE|Y$阶层的省份数（$PROVS|Y$个）。\n
$REGIMENT_TYPE|Y$军团的数量（$REGIMENTS|Y$支）多于$ESTATE|Y$阶层的省份数（$PROVS|Y$个）。\n
$REGIMENT_TYPE|Y$军团的数量（$REGIMENTS|Y$支）不等于$ESTATE|Y$阶层的省份数（$PROVS|Y$个）。\n
$REGIMENT_TYPE|Y$军团的数量（$REGIMENTS|Y$支）不少于$ESTATE|Y$阶层的省份数（$PROVS|Y$个）。\n
$REGIMENT_TYPE|Y$军团的数量（$REGIMENTS|Y$支）不多于$ESTATE|Y$阶层的省份数（$PROVS|Y$个）。\n

original: Small groups of settlers from home, mostly the wives and children of Company men, make a home at the Settlement. Communities of our own culture make developing the area a smoother process.\n
translation: 从本土来的小规模移民已经在此地定居，他们大多是公司雇员的妻子和孩子。属于我们自己的社区让我们在当地的建设与发展变得更加容易。

original: Settlers from our homeland have expanded their community to encompass an entire District in a local city. Their presence greatly improves our capacity for urban development in the area.\n
translation: 来自我们故乡的垦殖者已将他们的社区扩展到环绕本地城市的一整个街区。他们极大地提高了我们在此地安居乐业的机会。\n

original: The Township is a settlement on foreign shores inhabited entirely by natives of our homeland. They generate a great demand for local goods and labor that draws those who trade in such commodities to the area.\n
translation: 这个城镇是一个完全由我国本土移民形成的海外定居点。他们对当地商品和劳动力的巨大需求，吸引了那些从事此类商品交易的人来到该地区。\n

original: $INVESTOR|Y$ does NOT have a $INVESTMENT|Y$ Trade Company Investment in $AREA|Y$\n
$INVESTOR|Y$ has a $INVESTMENT|Y$ Trade Company Investment in $AREA|Y$\n
§RYou will lose the following Trade Company Investments!§!\n
translation: §R你将失去以下贸易公司投资！§!\n

original:
§Y$TYPE$ Policies§!
We can have $AMOUNT|G$ $TYPE$ policies active at the same time.

$MODIFIERS$
translation:
§Y$TYPE$政策§!
我们可以同时启用$AMOUNT|G$个$TYPE$政策。

$MODIFIERS$
自治领地内最低自治度

original: §RYou cannot manage Rebel Suppression while moving§!\n
translation: §R不能在移动时管理对叛乱者的压制§!\n

original: §YThis is your current selected reform on this level.§!
translation: §Y这是你目前在此级别上选择的改革。§!

original: Enact or change reforms to giving you permanent benefits and enabling new mechanics.
translation: 制定或变更改革将为你提供永久性加成并启用新机制。

original: Does not have an exclusive Government Reform.
Select a province to buy and assign to a Trade Company.
translation: 选择一个省份购买并分配给贸易公司。

original: Policies are powerful modifiers for your country that will last until you choose to remove them. Policies become available as you fill out your idea groups, two idea groups of different categories will combined together make a policy available to you. They cost monarch power each month to maintain them and are locked in for 10 years after picking.
translation: 政策对你的国家来说是强有力的修正，它会一直持续到你选择废除它们为止。当您选择好理念组后，政策即可生效，两个不同类别的理念组结合在一起，可为您制定出一个政策。它们每个月都要花费一些君主点数来维持，并且在移除后会有10年的禁用期。

original: This will add a new team to the multiplayer campaign.
translation: 这会增加一个新的队伍到多人战役中。

original: This will remove the team $TEAM|Y$ from the multiplayer campaign.
translation: 这会从多人战役中移除$TEAM|Y$队伍。

original: This will change the name of the team.
Can't break alliance with team mate $MEMBER$!
Make a $NAME|Y$ Trade Company Investment in $AREA|Y$.
translation: 在$AREA|Y$区域进行$NAME|Y$贸易公司投资。

original: §RPick a country before you join a team!§!
translation: §R在加入一支队伍前先选择一个国家！§!

original: Create a level $LEVEL|Y$ Center of Trade in $PROVINCE|G$\n
translation: 在$PROVINCE|G$建立一个$LEVEL|Y$级贸易中心\n

original: Click or right click to upgrade or downgrade.
translation: 点击或右键点击以升级或降级。

original: Right click to downgrade to $NAME|Y$ for $COST|R$ prestige.
§RYou cannot downgrade the Center of Trade because it is already at the lowest level!§!
translation: §R无法降级此贸易中心，已经是最低级别！§!

original: §RYou cannot downgrade the Center of Trade if you have Negative prestige!§!
translation: §R负威望时无法降级贸易中心！§!

original: §RYou cannot upgrade the Center of Trade because it is already a top level!§!
translation: §R无法升级此贸易中心，已经是最高级别！§!

original: §RUpgrading the Center of Trade requires $REQUIRED|Y$¤ but you only have $AVAILABLE|Y$¤.§!
translation: §R升级此贸易中心需要$REQUIRED|Y$¤而你只有$AVAILABLE|Y$¤。§!

original: The maximum number of top level Centers of Trade is limited to the number of Merchants you have.\n\n§RYou cannot upgrade to $UPGRADE_NAME|Y$ as you already have $NUM_CENTERS|Y$ top level Centers of Trade in your country.§!
translation: 顶级贸易中心的数量上限取决于你商人团的数量。\n\n§R无法升级为$UPGRADE_NAME|Y$，你的国家已经有了$NUM_CENTERS|Y$个顶级贸易中心。§!

original: §RYou already have a top level Center of Trade in $STATE|Y$!§!
translation: §R直属州$STATE|Y$已经有了一个顶级贸易中心！§!

original: The Center of Trade will be downgraded one level if it changes owner.
translation: 所有者变更时贸易中心将被降一级。

original: §RYou cannot upgrade or downgrade the Center of Trade during war!§!
translation: §R战争期间无法升级或降级贸易中心！§!

original: §RYou cannot upgrade or downgrade the Center of Trade of a province you do not own!§!
translation: §R不能升级或降级一个不属于你的省份的贸易中心！§!

original: §RYou cannot upgrade or downgrade the Center of Trade of a province under siege!§!
translation: §R不能升级或降级一个被围困省份的贸易中心！§!

original: §RYou cannot upgrade or downgrade the Center of Trade of an occupied province!§!
translation: §R不能升级或降级一个不被占领省份的贸易中心！§!

original: §RYou cannot upgrade or downgrade the Center of Trade of a province that is not your core!§!
translation: §R不能升级或降级一个不不是你核心的省份的贸易中心！§!

original: §RYou can only upgrade a Center of Trade in a State or in a Trade Company!§!
translation: §R只能升级直属州或贸易公司里的贸易中心！§!

original:
Upgrade to $NAME|Y$:
$DESCRIPTION$.
This will provide the following benefits:
$BENEFITS$
and will cost $COST|Y$¤.
translation:
升级为$NAME|Y$：
$DESCRIPTION$。
这将带来以下好处：
$BENEFITS$
升级将花费$COST|Y$¤。

original:
Downgrade to $NAME|Y$:
$DESCRIPTION$.
This will provide the following benefits:
$BENEFITS$
and will cost $COST|R$ prestige.
translation:
降级为$NAME|Y$：
$DESCRIPTION$。
这将带来以下好处：
$BENEFITS$
降级将消耗$COST|R$威望。

original: No Center of Trade of level $LEVEL|Y$\n
At least one Center of Trade of level $LEVEL|Y$\n
No Center of Trade of level $LEVEL|Y$\n
At least one Center of Trade of level $LEVEL|Y$\n
Have less than $NUM|Y$ Centers of Trade\n
Have at least $NUM|Y$ Centers of Trade\n
This province is a natural harbor and a trading hub. Local traders have come here for centuries, the infrastructure for trade emerging despite a lack of state investment.
translation: 这个省份是一个天然的港口和贸易中心。本地的商人从几个世纪前开始就在这里活动了，尽管缺乏国家投资，贸易基础设施也在不断完善。

original: This province is a major entrepot for trade. Merchants from the entire region gather here to buy and sell goods.
translation: 这个省份是一个主要的贸易中转站。整个地区的商人都会在这买卖货物。

original: This province is one of the major ports of the world. Goods from the entire globe regularly pass through here and the city itself is as famous as many kingdoms.
translation: 这个省份是世界上最主要的港口之一。 全世界的商品都通常经由此处运转，这座城市本身就像许多王国一样出名。

original: This province is a natural spot for trade and local merchants have been coming here for centuries.
translation: 这个省份是一个天然的贸易中转点。本地的商人从几个世纪前开始就在这里活动了。

original: This city is a major regional market and traders from the entire region regularly seek it out to sell and buy goods.
translation: 这座城市是一个重要的区域贸易市场，整个地区的商人都会在这里交易货物。

original: This province is one of the most important trade centers in the world. There are few goods that cannot be bought here and the city itself is as famous as many kingdoms.
translation: 这个省份是世界上最重要的贸易中心之一。 这里几乎没有买不到的商品，这座城市本身就像许多王国一样出名。

original: A colonist is already working on promoting Settlement Growth in $PROVINCE$.
translation: 一个殖民队正在$PROVINCE$提高省份发展。

original: Your colonist will work on promoting settlement growth in the province, giving a $CHANCE$ chance every year of raising Development $INC|Y$ point in a random category. This chance is reduced with higher Development and affected by Local Development Cost modifiers.
translation: 你的殖民者将在这个省份进行促进垦殖的工作，每年都会有$CHANCE$的几率增加$INC|Y$点基础税收、生产或人力。这一几率会因更高的发展度而减少，也会受本地发展成本修正影响。

original: Are you sure you want to send a Colonist to promote Settlement Growth in $PROV|Y$?
translation: 你确定要派遣一名殖民者到$PROV|Y$垦殖？

original: Are you sure you want to stop promoting Settlement Growth in $PROV|Y$?
translation: 你确定你想要停止促进在$PROV|Y$的垦殖定居增长？

original: This is a special Government Reform. You can not switch to another Reform on this level.
translation: 这是一项特殊的政府改革。你不能切换至在此级别的其他改革。

original: The [sepoy_province.TradeCompany.GetName] is always hiring hardy men with military experience. The logistics of recruiting from [Root.Capital.GetName] can be arduous however. Company officers have suggested that a more cost-effective way to bolster Company ranks would be to hire more extensively from the local Indian populace. These ‘sepoy’ regiments are drawn from the upper castes of Indian society, mostly Brahmins and Rajput Kshatriyas, and thus well versed in the ways of war. Many sepoys are willing to serve the Company due to its reputation for honest and fair payment, which has been difficult to find in India of late.\n\nThough a more homogenous army of [Root.GetAdjective] soldiers might be easier to command, we should not ignore the vast pool of manpower available on the subcontinent.
translation: [sepoy_province.TradeCompany.GetName]往往雇佣有服役经验的强壮男子。然而，对后勤而言，把来自首都[Root.Capital.GetName]的军团运送到当地是个艰巨的任务。公司官员建议，提升公司等级的一种更具成本效益的方式是从印度当地民众中更广泛地募兵。这些印度兵团是从印度社会的上层阶级中招募的，以婆罗门和拉杰普特的刹帝利为主，故而精通战争方略。许多印度兵甘愿为公司服役，因为贸易公司具有通常难以在印度找到的诚实守信和合理报酬的声誉。\n\n尽管由一些纯粹的[Root.GetAdjective]士兵所组成的军队可能更容易指挥，但我们不应忽视在次大陆的大量人力资源。

original: We do not need to recruit from the natives.
translation: 我们不需要从原住民那里招募人才。

original: Whether acquired by conflict or by purchase, treaties recognizing Company ownership of [land_purchase_province.GetName] have become disputed. Land brokers of the [land_purchase_province.TradeCompany.GetName] insist that their rightful territory extends somewhat farther than the land they currently administer.\n\nTheir insistence is motivated by the fact that the land in question has been valued particularly highly by the brokers, who are now insisting that [land_purchase_country.GetName] recognize Company ownership of the border area. [land_purchase_country.GetAdjective] officials have not reacted kindly to this unexpected expansionism, and demand adherence to their interpretation of the treaties.
translation: 无论是通过冲突还是通过购买，承认贸易公司对省份[land_purchase_province.GetName]所有权的条约都存在争议。[land_purchase_province.TradeCompany.GetName]的土地代理人坚持他们的合法领土范围比他们目前管辖的土地延伸得更远。\n\n他们坚持的动机在于这些争议领土特别受到代理人的高度重视，他们现在坚持认为[land_purchase_country.GetName]已承认贸易公司对边界地区的所有权。[land_purchase_country.GetAdjective]官员没有表示出对这种意想不到的扩张倾向的善意，并要求代理人遵守他们对条约的解释。

original: They should have read the fine print.
Let it go, we do not need this land.
translation: 随它去吧，我们不需要这块土地。

original: Making a profit on trade with China is a conundrum for the [opium_province.TradeCompany.GetName]. China produces sought-after goods such as tea, siks, and porcelain, but there is little we have to exchange in return besides simple gold and silver. This leaves the Company with a trade deficit.\n\nThere is however one commodity that would surely sell in Chinese markets; opium. The fields of [opium_province.GetName] are well-suited to the growing of opium poppies, which the Company could manufacture into the drug. While the opium trade is prohibited throughout [canton_owner.GetName], the Company believes it will have little difficulty smuggling it into Canton regardless. Such illicit actions would surely upset [canton_owner.GetAdjective] authorities, but it is difficult to pass up an opportunity for profit.
translation: 在与中国的贸易中获利是[opium_province.TradeCompany.GetName]的一个难题。中国生产茶叶、丝绸、瓷器等受欢迎的商品，但除了直接的金银之外，我们几乎没有什么东西能拿来购买这些商品。这为贸易公司带来了贸易逆差。\n\n然而，有一种商品肯定会在中国市场上销售：鸦片。[opium_province.GetName]的田地非常适合种植罂粟，贸易公司可以把它们制成毒品。虽然鸦片贸易在整个[canton_owner.GetName]都是被禁止的，但贸易公司相信，无论如何，将鸦片走私到广州都不会有什么困难。这种非法行为肯定会扰乱[canton_owner.GetAdjective]政府，但我们很难放弃获利的机会。
我们不能拿中国人的愤怒冒险。

original: As soon as an appointed factor leaves [Root.Capital.GetName], we expect them to begin lining their own pockets as much as they serve the interests of the [corrupt_factor_province.TradeCompany.GetName]. Rarely, however, are Company officials so egregious in their greed as [Root.corrupt_factor_name.GetName], the factor of [corrupt_factor_province.GetName]. Through his private investments, [Root.corrupt_factor_name.GetName] has cornered the local market in [corrupt_factor_province.GetTradeGoodsName].\n\nInvestors fearing for the reputation of the Company demand that the renegade factor be recalled to [Root.Capital.GetName] to face punishment. More opportunistic elements suggest that we should instead buy out his enterprises, incorporating them into the Company’s operations and rewarding the factor for his initiative.
