translation: 一旦指定的省督离开[Root.Capital.GetName]，我们期望他们在填满自己的钱袋以外，也要考虑[corrupt_factor_province.TradeCompany.GetName]的利益。然而，很少有公司职员像[corrupt_factor_province.GetName]的省督[Root.corrupt_factor_name.GetName]那的贪婪。通过私人投资，[Root.corrupt_factor_name.GetName]彻底垄断了[corrupt_factor_province.GetTradeGoodsName]的本地市场。\n\n担心公司声誉的投资者要求将这名叛逆的省督召回[Root.Capital.GetName]以面对惩罚。但是更多的机会主义者建议我们应该买断他的企业，把它整合进我们的公司中，并奖励他的主动性。

original: We need to rein in corruption. Recall [Root.corrupt_factor_name.GetName] to [Root.Capital.GetName].

From its humble origins as a joint-stock company, the [company_rule_province.TradeCompany.GetName] has grown beyond a mere association of merchants and administrators. The Company has become a power in its own right, having taken on the function of government in the lands in controls, even commanding its own armies and fleets. The [company_rule_province.TradeCompany.GetName] is truly a force to be reckoned with.
translation: 起源于一个普普通通的股份制公司，[company_rule_province.TradeCompany.GetName]现在已经不再仅仅是一个商人与行政管理者的联盟。贸易公司本身变为了一股新兴力量，在它所控制的土地上承担了政府的职能，甚至指挥着自己的军队和舰队。[company_rule_province.TradeCompany.GetName]是一股真正无法忽视的力量。

original:
The [company_missionary_province.TradeCompany.GetName]’s policy of religious tolerance has thus far kept the local [company_missionary_province.Religion.GetName] population content with Company rule.

A group of evangelical missionaries have arrived in [company_missionary_province.GetName] with the intention of spreading the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith to the heathens. These missionaries request permission not only to preach, but to conduct mass conversions through coercive means.

Company ambassadors fear that such intolerance is very likely to provoke a reaction from the people of [company_missionary_province.GetName], and urge the Company to restrict missionary activity.
translation:
到目前为止，[company_missionary_province.TradeCompany.GetName]的宗教宽容政策让[company_missionary_province.Religion.GetName]的本地人口满足于公司的统治。

一群福音派传教士来到[company_missionary_province.GetName]，意图将[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰传播给异教徒。但是这群传教士不仅想要传教，还希望通过强制手段强迫本地人改变信仰。

公司官员担心这样的宗教迫害很可能引起[company_missionary_province.GetName]人民的反抗，并敦促公司限制传教活动。

original: Tolerance is necessary to Company operations.
translation: 容忍对于公司的运作是必要的。

original: Local merchants in [company_mint_province.GetName] have complained to the [company_mint_province.TradeCompany.GetName] about a lack of coinage stifling the flow of trade. The Company has been given permission by the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] to issue its own currency, allowing the foundation of mints in provinces under its control.\n\nMinting of course requires a supply of an appropriate metal. Gold, silver, and bronze are not always readily available to the Company. An alternative source of coinage would be to accumulate coins from [appropriated_currency_country.GetName] and countermark them with the Company stamp. This would likely anger the [appropriated_currency_country.Monarch.GetTitle] of [appropriated_currency_country.GetName], who would see this as a defacement of [appropriated_currency_country.Monarch.GetHerHis] image.
translation: [company_mint_province.GetName]的当地商人已经向[company_mint_province.TradeCompany.GetName]抱怨表示缺乏货币抑制了商贸流动。该公司已获准[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]发行自己的货币，允许在其控制下的省份建立铸币厂。\n\n铸造需要提供合适的金属，但金银铜并非随时可为公司所用。另一种货币的替代来源是[appropriated_currency_country.GetName]积累的货币，并用公司凭证作担保。这可能会激怒[appropriated_currency_country.Monarch.GetTitle]的[appropriated_currency_country.GetName]，他们会认为这是对[appropriated_currency_country.Monarch.GetHerHis]形象的破坏。

original: [Root.GetAdjective] settlers are thriving in [company_settlement.GetName]. They have established a small yet influential community, living largely apart from the [company_settlement.Culture.GetName] locals. In parts of [company_settlement.GetName], one might almost image they were walking the streets of [Root.Capital.GetName] as [Root.GetAdjective] architecture and institutions dominate their cloistered districts.\n\nRepresentatives of the [Root.GetAdjective] community in [company_settlement.GetName] are seeking investment to further develop the province. Schools, hospitals, and places of worship are needed to accommodate the settlers.
translation: [Root.GetAdjective]垦殖者在[company_settlement.GetName]中繁荣兴盛，他们建立了一个小而有影响力的社区，与本地人[company_settlement.Culture.GetName]大相径庭。在[company_settlement.GetName]的部分区域，一个本国人几乎会认为他正走在首都[Root.Capital.GetName]的街道上，因为[Root.GetAdjective]建筑和机构统治着他们封闭的街区。\n\n[company_settlement.GetName]中的[Root.GetAdjective]社区代表正在寻求投资以进一步发展该省。他们需要学校、医院和礼拜场所来容纳更多定居者。

original: Grant money to build a holy place.

translation: 不良商人无视公司的专买权

original: The [monopoly_ignored_province.TradeCompany.GetName] has been granted a monopoly on trade in [monopoly_ignored_province.GetTradeGoodsName] within its regional jurisdiction. Rogue traders are therefore a serious concern for the Company, as unlicensed traders threaten to undermine the monopoly through competition.\n\nSuch illicit dealings have become rife in [monopoly_ignored_province.GetName], where rogue traders are engaging in free trade with merchants from the neighboring state of [monopoly_ignored_country.GetName]. The Company wishes to crack down on this trade by either reminding the [monopoly_ignored_country.GetAdjective] traders that they are bound by treaty to respect the monopoly, or by prosecuting the rogue traders themselves, making an example of them in [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: [monopoly_ignored_province.TradeCompany.GetName]被授予在其区域管理范围内[monopoly_ignored_province.GetTradeGoodsName]商品的特许贸易权。所以，非法商人成了贸易公司的重点关注对象，因为这些非法走私者威胁以竞争的方式破坏垄断。\n\n这种非法交易在[monopoly_ignored_province.GetName]变得十分常见，非法走私者在那里与来自邻国[monopoly_ignored_country.GetName]的商人进行自由贸易。贸易公司希望通过提醒[monopoly_ignored_country.GetAdjective]的商人他们应受法律的约束而尊重我们垄断经营的权力，或者由自己起诉走私犯来打击这种违法交易，在首都[Root.Capital.GetName]杀鸡儆猴。

original: [monopoly_ignored_country.GetName] must trade only with the Company.
We will prosecute the rogue traders ourselves.
translation: 我们会亲自起诉那些流氓商人。

original: The [company_interference_province.TradeCompany.GetName] reports that its neighbor, the nation of [company_interference_country_1.GetName], has become embroiled in war. Company officers see opportunity in the crisis, seeking to advance the long-term interests of the company. Winning the affections of [company_interference_country_1.GetName] would facilitate the peaceful growth of our trade in the region. Supporting their enemies, the state of [company_interference_country_2.GetName], might weaken [company_interference_country_1.GetName] enough that they would be forced to accept more coercive treaties, or even be vulnerable to a Company invasion.
translation: [company_interference_province.TradeCompany.GetName]报告称，它的邻国[company_interference_country_1.GetName]已被卷入战争。公司的雇员在这场危机中看到了为公司获得长远利益的机会。赢得[company_interference_country_1.GetName]的信赖将有助于促进本地区贸易的和平发展。另一方面，支持他们的敌人[company_interference_country_2.GetName]可能会削弱[company_interference_country_1.GetName]的实力，迫使他们与我们签订更多的不平等条约；公司甚至可能找到机会对此国进行入侵。

original: For reasons unknown to us, [From.GetName]'s trading company has offered to support us in our war. Let us hope that their ulterior motives do not harm us in the future.
translation: 我们不知道出于什么原因，[From.GetName]的贸易公司提出在我们的战争中支持我们。让我们祈祷他们的不明好意不会在未来伤害到我们。

original: Your Government Reforms prevent an updgrade to the next rank.
translation: 你的政府改革阻止了下一个等级的提升。

original: [GetYear]'s Monsoon weather has been far more severe than expected in [severe_monsoon_province.GetAreaName]. The powerful winds and heavy rains have caused extreme damage to rural and urban settlements alike. An costly relief effort will be needed to undo part of the damage, though it will take time for [severe_monsoon_province.GetAreaName] to fully recover.
translation: [GetYear]的季风天气比预期的要严重得多，在[severe_monsoon_province.GetAreaName]强风和暴雨对乡村和城市住区都造成了极大的破坏。尽管[severe_monsoon_province.GetAreaName]需要一段时间才能完全恢复，但还是需要花费代价高昂的救援工作才能消除部分损害。

original: The expected seasonal rains have failed to arrive in [monsoon_failure_province.GetAreaName]. A period of drought has begun, and famine will likely follow as crops fail.
translation: 预期的季节性降雨未能到达[monsoon_failure_province.GetAreaName]，一个干旱期已经开始，随着农作物的歉收，饥荒也会随之而来。

original: Seasonal rains have brought prosperity to [good_monsoon_province.GetAreaName], being neither too mild or too severe. As agriculture flourishes, the people prosper and wealth in the area has increased.
translation: 适时的季节性降雨给[good_monsoon_province.GetAreaName]带来了繁荣，随着农业的兴旺，这个地区的人民富裕起来，财富也增加了。

original: [company_drought_province.TradeCompany.GetName] rule has transformed the agricultural landscape of [company_drought_province.GetAreaName]. Where once the fields grew food for the local populace, the Company now requires them to focus heavily on cash crops. This short-sighted policy aimed at immediate profit has backfired as a particularly severe drought has gripped [company_drought_province.GetAreaName]. Unable to grow enough food to feed the people, the Company bears much responsibility for the famine and starvation to come.
translation: [company_drought_province.TradeCompany.GetName]的规定改变了[company_drought_province.GetAreaName]的农业面貌。一向是当地居民种植粮食的地方，该公司如今要求他们把重点放在经济作物上。这项针对即时利润的短视政策已经适得其反，现在因为特别严重的干旱已经导致[company_drought_province.GetAreaName]陷入了困境。由于没有种植足够的食物来养活居民，面对即将到来的饥荒和饥饿这家公司负有很大的责任。

original: Plums blossom in spring\nThe rains bring great abundance\nOur farmers prosper
translation: 梅花于春咲\n好雨携来照丰饶\n吾民乐逍遥

original: Provinces in the §Y[plum_rains_province.GetAreaName]§! Area producing §YGrain§!, §YWine§!, §YTea§!, or §YSpices§! get §Y'Plum Rain'§! for §Y5 years§!, giving the folloowing effects:\nLocal Production Efficiency: §G+20.0%§!
translation: 在§Y[plum_rains_province.GetAreaName]§!地区中所有生产§Y谷物§!、§Y酒类§!、§Y茶叶§!或§Y香料§!的省份§Y五年§!内获得§Y「梅雨」§!，产生以下效果：\n本地生产效率：§G+20.0%§!

original: [Root.Country.GetName] has achieved what few conquering empires have ever attempted; the conquest of the Rajputs. Whether Arabs, Turks, or Afghans, the Rajputs have historically resisted the rule of any would-be conquerors.\n\nThe power of the Rajput clans extends far beyond Rajasthan itself, occupying a privileged position throughout northern India. With the Rajput clans now at least nominally accepting our rule, we should consider their future in the [Root.Country.GetAdjective] nation. With their extensive reach and influence, not to mention the military might they wield, it may be wise to elevate them to positions of power throughout the realm. This power however could also be turned against us; we could alternatively attempt to break their authority and integrate Rajasthan fully into [Root.Country.GetName].
translation: [Root.Country.GetName]已经实现了少数征服帝国曾经尝试过的成就：征服拉杰普特人。无论是阿拉伯人、土耳其人还是阿富汗人，拉杰普特人历来都抵制任何想征服他们的统治。\n\n拉杰普特部族的力量远远超出了拉贾斯坦邦的范围，在整个印度北部具有举足轻重地位。由于拉杰普特部族现在至少名义上接受了我们的统治，我们应该考虑他们在[Root.Country.GetAdjective]的未来。就凭他们广泛的影响力范围，更不用说他们拥有的军事力量了，将他们提升到整个国家的权力位置上或许是明智之举。然而，这股力量也可能会对我们不利;我们或者可以尝试打破他们的权威，把拉贾斯坦邦完全纳入到[Root.Country.GetName]。
提高拉杰普特阶层§Y10§!点忠诚度。
降低马拉塔阶层§Y10§!点忠诚度。

original: A great multitude of Maratha warriors have erupted forth from the Desh into lands far from their native home. Finding employ as mercenaries, as generals in foreign armies, some even as conquering Princes, the Marathas have become a force to be reckoned with in India.\n\nWith our conquest of the Deccan complete, we must decide on their future within the [Root.Country.GetAdjective] Empire. By offering them a favored position in our society, we could benefit from their military prowess and unyielding ambition, though that same ambition makes them a potential danger. Alternatively, we could keep them in check by centralizing our administration throughout the Deccan.
translation:
历史上，大量的马拉塔战士离开他们位于德什的故乡，出发前往遥远的异地。其中的一些成为了雇佣兵，一些就任异国军队的将军，甚至有一些当上了王子。不论如何，马拉塔人已经成为了印度一支不可忽视的力量。

随着我们对德干高原的征服，我们必须决定马拉塔人在[Root.Country.GetAdjective]帝国的未来。若我们给予他们优待，他们的军事实力和百折不饶可以为我们所用，但是这可能会让他们成为潜在的危险。 或者，我们可以将他们置于德干的集权化管理之下。
巩固拉杰普特人的势力
增加马拉塔阶层§Y10§!点忠诚度。
降低拉杰普特阶层§Y10§!点忠诚度。

original: Our conquest of Hindustan complete, [Root.Monarch.GetName] has decided to commemorate our victory by commissioning the most magnificent throne the world has ever seen. Adorned with jewels of all kinds, from diamonds to emeralds to pearls, the value of this seat exceeds that of the grandest mausoleums.\n\nThe question on the minds of all in court is where this throne shall be placed. Traditionally, the conquerors of Hindustan have ruled from Delhi and administered their empires from there. As the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]s of Delhi, it is up to us to uphold this tradition.
translation: 我们对印度斯坦的征服以胜利告终，[Root.Monarch.GetName]决定打造一尊空前华丽的王座以纪念我们的胜利。从钻石到翡翠，再到珍珠，这尊珠光闪烁的王座，其价值远胜最宏伟的陵墓。\n\n宫廷中所有人的脑海中都有个疑问：这尊王座将置于何处？传统上，印度斯坦的征服者们曾于德里登基并从那里他们统治帝国。作为德里的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]，我们有责任坚持这一传统。

original: We shall rule from Delhi, as our forebears did.
translation: 我们将在德里统治，一如先辈们所做的那样。

original: The spiritual importance of the sacred river Ganges cannot be understated. Far more than just a body of water, She is the Goddess Gangha who brings plenty and purity to all who bathe in Her waters.\n\nOur glorious conquest of the Indo-Gangetic Plain complete, we have tasked the Brahmins with organizing a lavish religious festival, unprecedented in scale. Consecrated in Gangha’s holy waters, the [Root.Country.GetName] Empire will surely be favored by the Gods for all eternity.
translation: 圣水恒河的精神重要性是不可估量的。她不仅是一条河流，她是甘伽女神的化身，为所有在她水中沐浴的人带去富足与纯净。\n\n完成了对印度恒河平原的辉煌征服后，我们已委托婆罗门组织一个规模空前奢华的宗教节日。于甘伽女神神圣的水体中祝圣，[Root.Country.GetName]帝国将永远被众神宠爱。

original: Following our conquest of the Marathi heartland, [Root.Country.GetName] is at the forefront of Maratha attention. We have allowed the Marathas a position of privilege and primacy which they have repaid through diligent military service. As their power grows and their efficacy is demonstrated, there are many who wonder out loud if a Maratha general would not be better suited to sit the throne of [Root.Country.GetName].
translation: 在我们征服马拉塔的心腹之地后，[Root.Country.GetName]成为马拉塔人关注的焦点。我们给予马拉塔人特权和重要的地位，而他们则勤勉地服从兵役以作为回报。随着他们权力的增长和效力的发挥，很多人都在想，一位马拉塔的将军是否更适合坐上[Root.Country.GetName]的王位。

original: Following our conquest of the Marathi heartland, [Root.Country.GetName] is at the forefront of Maratha attention. We have allowed the Marathas a position of privilege and primacy which they have repaid through diligent military service. Our martial culture and policy of militarization have proven to be highly effective.
translation: 在我们征服马拉塔的心腹之地后，[Root.Country.GetName]成为马拉塔人关注的焦点。我们给予马拉塔人特权和重要的地位，而他们则勤勉地服从兵役以作为回报。我们尚武的文化与军事化的政策已被证明是卓有成效的。

original: A Maratha general shall lead us.
translation: 一位马拉塔的将军将引领我们！

original: The Marathas will serve us well.
translation: 马拉塔人将会继续服务我们。

original: Trade Company Investments are expensive but influential Trade Company possessions. They can apply substantial beneficial effects to all provinces in the area or Trade Company Region, whether owned by you or by native countries. While most have local effects, some apply to your entire country.
translation: 贸易公司的投资是昂贵的却富有影响力的公司财产。不论是您拥有的还是原住民国家拥有的省份，贸易公司的投资可对地区内所有省份或贸易公司地区产生实质性的正面影响。虽然大部分都是本地修正，但也有一些作用于整个国家。

original: Our Policies give us the following bonuses:
translation: 我们的政策给予我们以下加成：

original: Assimilated cultures counts as accepted cultures in your country. You will receive no penalty on provinces of that culture and after it been assimilated it is permanent. A culture will become assimilated when you have conquered every single province with that culture present. However you no longer have Cultural Union on Empire tier with this government form.
translation: 已同化文化被视为您所在国家的相容文化。 因此拥有该文化的省份不再受到异文化惩罚。同化是永久性的。 当您征服了该文化的所有省份时，该文化就会被同化。 但是，当您采用这种这种政体时，您的帝国级政府将不再享有文化母国增益（即未全部征服的同文化组非主流文化省份受到文化惩罚）。

original: Assimilated culture groups will give you various different benefits. A group becomes assimilated when you own all provinces that has a culture that belongs to that group. If you do not hold all those provinces you will lose the modifier.
translation: 当您拥有一个文化组所有的省份时，这个文化组就会被同化。被同化的文化组会给您带来多种的增益，但是当您失去属于这个文化组的省份时，增益就会丢失。

original: Through elaborate schemes the foreign [From.Monarch.GetTitle] [From.Monarch.GetName] has seized control of our States General. Together with the Monarchists [From.Monarch.GetSheHe] has forced through legislation severely limiting the power of our most esteemed assembly.
translation: 通过精心策划，外国[From.Monarch.GetTitle][From.Monarch.GetName]已经掌控了我们的国家政权。[From.Monarch.GetSheHe]同君主主义者一道，强制通过立法严格限制备受我们尊崇的议会的权力。

original: After years of bickering, internal conflict, and delayed legislation, all have agreed that something must be done about the state of the Assembly.\n\nThe ancient House of [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName], who for years have been biding their time, has, in a superbly timed maneouvre, spearheaded a bill abolishing the assembly altogether, and reinstating [Root.Monarch.GetName] on the throne of [Root.GetName].
translation: 经过多年的争吵，内部冲突和拖沓的立法，所有人都同意必须就大会的状况采取一些措施。\n\n古老的[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]家族多年来一直在等待他们的机会。现在，他们恰到好处地带头提出了一个废除集会，并重新将权力归于[Root.GetName]的[Root.Monarch.GetName]的提案。

original: The resolution of this Issue had the following effect:\nGained years of Manpower scaled to Parliamentary Seats.

translation: 通过这一议题会获得以下效果：\n耆那阶层获得20忠诚度。

translation: 通过这一议题会获得以下效果：\n马拉塔阶层获得20忠诚度。

translation: 他们并不拥有在我们殖民范围内、可被分配给贸易公司且不是首都或贸易公司的沿海省份。

original: You cannot request charter company from a country that has its capital on the same continent as you
translation: 不能向首都与你同大陆的国家申请特许贸易公司

$INVESTOR|Y$ has a Trade Company Investment in $AREA|Y$\n

Years of internal strife within the [Root.GetAdjectiveCap] Assembly have begun to take their toll on the national spirit of [Root.GetName]. The rising popular opinion against the Assembly has drawn out many vocal opponents among our citizens.\n\nAt long last, one contender stands tall amidst his opponents, overthrowing what little opposition remains in the Assembly, and reinstating the glorious traditions of [Root.GetName].
translation: 在[Root.GetAdjectiveCap]议会内部多年的派系斗争已开始对[Root.GetName]的破坏了我们的民族精神。日益高涨的反议会情绪在我们的公民中化作了阵阵反对的声潮。\n\n最终，一位竞争者在从他的对手中脱颖而出，打倒了议会中剩下的少数反对派，并在恢复了[Root.GetName]的光荣传统。

original: Every owned province with the §YBrahmins§! estate gets §Y'Non-Brahmin Religious Movements'§! for §Y15 years§!, giving the following effects:\nLocal Unrest: §G-5.00§!\nMonthly Autonomy Change: §R+0.05%§!
translation: 名下所有拥有§Y婆罗门§!阶层的省份将得到为期§Y15年§!的§Y「非婆罗门宗教运动」§!，给予以下效果：\n本地叛乱风险：§G-5.00§!\n每月自治度变化：§R+0.05%§!

original: Changes in your Country have lead to the Government $REFORM|Y$ no longer being viable and it has now been abolished. It has been replaced with $REPLACEMENT|Y$.
translation: 你国家的变化导致政府改革$REFORM|Y$不再是可行的并已废除这项改革。它已经被$REPLACEMENT|Y$替代。
